loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 59-year-old, married woman, a mother of nine children whom she has been taking care of all of her life, since her husband left them and travelled abroad to provide them with the necessary standard of living.

She has been working at selling clothes and underwear since fifteen years ago, and she is well known in her region.  She has a very good reputation.
 
Fatima is applying for her tenth loan cycle from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, in order to support the newly established home products business, through increasing the the items collection with newly released ones. Her previous loans helped her a lot in improving her business, and she was a good standing borrower too.

Fatima hopes to keep on developing her business, which reflects positively on both her social and financial living.

loans.use: to support her home products business.

loans.name: Natavan

texts.en:
Natavan is a 48-year-old, mother of four children. She is an IDP (internally displaced person) and lives with her husband and children in the Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. She is a Jabrayili refugee.  

Natavan sells food products such as macaroni, rice, candies, cookies, sugar and beverages in her shop.  She has fifteen years of experience in this field, which makes her a knowledgeable and skilled person. Her profession is accounting, which helps her to run this business effectively.
 
The food products she sells is very popular among people and is in high demand.  Her monthly profit from selling food is 80 AZN.  Her husband helps her to sell products in the shop. She is a very successful entrepreneur because of her good location, in the central bazaar of her home city.

Natavan would like to increase her sales and invest additional capital. For this purpose she has applied for a loan of 1,900 AZN. She will purchase and diversify into additional food stuffs with this loan.

loans.use: to increase her sales and invest additional capital.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
For years, Fatuma has operated a retail business, selling from home to her neighbours and passers-by. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Fatuma dreams of establishing a hotel in the future. 

With the Kshs 50,000 loan she wants to purchase three bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase three bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat and sugar.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es: Aníbal de 54 años de edad , está casado y tiene 6 hijos con quienes vive en la casa que heredó de sus padres hace 15 años.Aníbal es agricultor y se dirige todos los dias a sus terrenos agrícolas, comenta que es muy cansado tener que levantarse muy temprano, pero en la temporada de cosecha esto le resulta satisfactorio, pues tiene la seguridad de que podrá obtener buenos resultados en la venta de sus alimentos. “Si no logro limpiar, fertilizar y mantener mis sembríos lejos de plagas, puedo tener una buena cosecha”, afirma. Sus alimentos los comercializa en una ciudad cercana, pues le resulta más fácil trasladarse hasta dicho lugar. Aprovecha su trabajo en el campo para criar animales, tiene 22 ovejas y 2 vacas, de estas últimas extrae la leche que producen para su consumo, mientras que las ovejas las comercializa con los ganaderos de la zona, obteniendo de esa manera un ingreso extra.Este es el segundo crédito con Kiva y se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo financiero brindado razón por la cual se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas.Aníbal, invertirá los S/.1000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para distribuir en sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Anibal is 54 years old, is married and has 6 children that live with him in the home that he inherited from his parents 15 years ago.  Anibal is a farmer and works everyday in his fields.  He tells us that he is very tired, as he has to get up very early, but in the harvesting season this turns out well since he has the security of being able to obtain good results in selling his foods.  "If I am unable to clean, fertilize and maintain my seedlings without pests, I will have a good harvest." he affirms.  

He sells his foods in a nearby city, since it is easier to move them to this place.  He takes advantage of his work in the country by raising animals.  He has 22 sheep an 2 cows.  He milks the cows, and sells the sheep to the livestock breeders of the region, obtaining extra income in this way.

This is his 2nd loan with Kiva, and he is very grateful for the financial help offered.  He pledges to pay his quotas on time.  Anibal will invest 1,000 soles in buying organic fertilizer to put on his plants.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Adjo

texts.fr: Jeune femme de 34ans, Adjo est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants en charge. Pour subvenir à ses besoins, elle fait son premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter un congélateur et des matières premières (bissap, sucre, lait…). Elle est commerçante de yaourt et du jus depuis 2012 et le fait à domicile. Elle espère devenir grossiste et se lancer plus tard dans la vie maritale.
texts.en: Adjo is a young woman of 34, who is single and has no children in her care. In order to meet her needs, she is taking her first WAGES loan to purchase a freezer and raw materials (hibiscus flowers, sugar, milk, etc.). Adjo has been selling yogurt and juice since 2012 and works from home. She hopes to become a wholesaler and, later on, to give married life a try.

loans.use: To purchase a freezer and raw materials.

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en:
Zahra is a 38-year-old married woman, mother of two children. Six months ago she established a small bakery in order to help her husband in making their living. Zahra and her husband are Palestinian refugees living and working in a Palestinian camp. Her customers are camp citizens and she works hard to please and attract them with the special dough and ingredients she uses. Zahra's specialties attract new customers and keep them coming back.

Zahra is requesting her first loan through the Kiva partner Al Majmoua to buy necessary tools for her newly established business. Her bakery needs a lot of things at the beginning and Zahra wants to make sure that she is capable of meeting customer demand. In the future, she hopes to keep on expanding her business as much as she can to provide for her family. Zahra hopes that one day she might move her bakery outside the camp.

loans.use: to buy tools and supplies for her bakery

loans.name: Saida

texts.en:
Saida aged 44 years old, is a married woman with eight kids, five of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her children. 

Saida operates a grocery vegetable-selling stall; she sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbours. She faces the challenge of a high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

Saida dreams of expanding her business and hiring one person to help in running the business in the future. 

With the Kshs 10,000 loan she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes, and onions for resale.

loans.name: Djiguissèmè Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Djiguissèmè  est composé de cinq  femmes qui sont majoritairement des mariées et monogames. Elles ont en moyenne 43ans et 6 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans le quartier de Péléngana à Ségou (4ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers leurs activités, les liens de voisinage et de parenté. Elles font le petit commerce d’habits, des ustensiles  etc. 
Dans le but de consolider leur petit commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 13ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Batou (2ème  femme debout de la  gauche vers la droite  sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de Bazin de toute sorte. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 50 mètres  de Bazin. La revente se fait au comptant et à crédit dans la ville de Ségou sur place une clientèle composée d’hommes et  de femmes. Madame Batou compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50 000 FCFA, qui sera réinvesti dans l’activité et assurer l’entretien des enfants.
texts.en:
Djiguissèmè Group is made up of five women, most of whom are married and monogamous. They average 43 years of age and six children each. The women all live in the Péléngana neighborhood in Ségou (Mali's 4th Administrative District) and met through their businesses, as well as neighborhood and family ties. They sell clothing, utensils, etc.

With the goal of strengthening their business, the members of the group decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso and are now in their 13th group loan cycle.

Mrs. Batou (the second woman standing in the photo, from left to right) is a major vendor of all types of damask. She plans to use her loan to purchase 50 meters of the cloth. Her sales are made for cash and credit on site in the city of Ségou to a group of customers made up of men and women. Mrs. Batou expects to see an average monthly profit of 50,000 CFA francs, which will be reinvested in the business and will ensure the care of her children.

loans.use: To purchase damask cloth.

loans.name: Macaria

texts.en:
Macaria is a married woman and a mother of  four children. She lives in San Miguel, Bohol. Macaria is a farmer and has been in the farming business for several years now.

Macaria is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. With this loan, she and her husband will be able to produce a healthy and good quality crop. Macaria wants to expand her business in the future in order to augment her income.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for her farm.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet, who is married and has kids who go to school, is a very hard-working and enterprising woman who says that she has been able to greatly increase her income and help her family, thanks to her hard work.

She is asking for a loan of Kshs 50,000 to buy ingredients such as wheat flour, milk, eggs, detergents, maize flour and sugar that will help her to invest back into her business. She is grateful for the new support she has received.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as wheat flour, milk, eggs, detergents, maize flour and sugar.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy grocery items

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is married and a farmer in San Miguel, Bohol, Philippines. She has been a farmer for more than 12 years now.

Lorna is requesting a loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and pesticides for her rice field. She will use her loan to improve her farm as well as her harvest. In the future, Lorna hopes to make her business a success and sustainable.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer, and pesticides

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a wall.

loans.name: Teona

texts.en:
Teona is 22 years old. She lives in Kutaisi, West Georgia, with her parents. She works in a local shop as a seller and her monthly salary is the only source of income for her family. Teona  has requested loans from local financial institutions several times to start a family business but her loan requests have always been rejected because of her low income and her family’s poor living conditions. 

Teona is requesting a loan from Credo to start up a family business. She will open a business selling clothing and household goods. Teona will go to Turkey to purchase items at wholesale prices and bring them back to her home district to sell at a mark-up to villagers.  Her loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. This start-up loan program envisions the provision of business start-up and re-startup loans with soft conditions to rural poor people who do not have access to loan credits. These rural poor are regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of their low income. Teona's loan will help her to earn additional income for her family and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and household items to sell

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu operates a food business and makes and sells dumplings and flatbread. She also operates a green grocery. Saumu sells from home to her neighbors and passersby. Her major business challenge is seasonality. Saumu decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

Saumu is requesting a 50,000 KES loan to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat, and sugar.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, cooking fat, and sugar

loans.name: Dahya

texts.en:
Dahya is a 55-year-old, married woman. She is a Palestinian refugee, who has been working, selling thyme since 2005, to help her husband in making their living.

Dahya is a hard worker, she knows that her husband's work is unstable with no specific daily income, that's why she works hard in developing her business through increasing her production and income.

Today, Dahya is applying for her second loan cycle from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, in order to make the maintenance on her house, which is located in a Palestinian Camp, after the hard winter season they faced.  Her previous loan was invested in increasing her business capital which reflected positively on her income and business development.  She hopes to stay in good health and stay capable of helping her husband in their living.

loans.use: to make necessary maintenance to her house.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a very kind and hard-working person. He lives with his three children and his wife.

He works very hard on his own piece of land where he grows rice. His products are very good quality. His land is in an area of easy access. This is very good for him because his customers are able to go directly to his place.

Richard is requesting a loan in order to have the money he needs to buy agricultural supplies. He will buy things like pesticides and fertilizers. He will also buy manure to improve the land that is shown in the photograph. This is where he wishes to plant his crops.

loans.use: to buy things for his business such as pesticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Martiniana

texts.en:
Martiniana is a 57-year-old, married woman and a mother of seven children. Martiniana lives with her family in San Miguel, Bohol. She is a farmer and has been in the farming business for more than twenty years now. Her husband works as a carpenter. 

Martiniana is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. Through this, she will be able to grow a healthy crops and augment her harvest.

In the future, Martiniana hopes to expand her farm, save money to reinvest in the same business and to repay her loan on time.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farm.

loans.name: Kellen

texts.en:
Kellen, aged 42, is a married woman with two children. Both of her kids attend school, which is the reason for her hard work.  She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Kellen has operated a grocery store business from home for the past four years, selling to passersby and neighbors. She cited seasonality and theft as her major challenges. 

With the loan of 10,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), she wants to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, sugar, detergent, and rice. Her dream is to see her children get a better education and become important people in society.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, sugar, detergent, and rice.

loans.name: Shokir

texts.ru: Шокиру 51 год. Он женат и у него четверо детей - два сына и две дочери. Его жена работает поваром, а одна дочь находится в загранице на заработках. Шокир пунктуальный, приветливый и добрый человек. У него высшее экономическое образование. В данное время он работает мастером по ремонту домов. Одновременно Шокир хочет заняться предоставлением услуги такси и развозить пассажиров по нужному маршруту. Такой вид деятельности является рентабельным в его городе. Он запрашивает кредит для приобретения легкового автомобиля модели Nexia.
texts.en: Shokir is 51 years old.  He is married and has four children - two sons and two daughters.  His wife works as a chef and one daughter is abroad earning money.  Shokir is a punctual, friendly and kind person.  He has a college economics education.  Right now he works in construction remodeling homes.  Simultaneously, Shokir provides taxi services and drives passengers on needed routes.  This business is cost-effective in his city.  He is asking for a loan to buy a Nexia car.

loans.use: to buy a car to provide taxi services

loans.name: Sanovarkhon

texts.ru: Сановархон со своей семьей живет в городе Турсунзода. Ей 48 лет. Она замужняя женщина. Сановархон мать четверых детей. Ее муж и сын знимаются сельским хозяйством. Второй сын находится зарубежом на заработках. Сановархон очень трудолюбивая и предприимчивая женщина. Она вместе с семьей занимается земледелием. У нее имеется участок орошаемой земли для ведения хозяйства. Сановархон занимается посевами бахчевой культуры уже 10 лет. Она берет кредит для закупа минерального удобрения для урожая овощей. В дальнейшем с полученной прибыли от продажи урожая Сановархон хочет приобрести машину.
texts.en: Sanovarkhon lives with her family in the city of Tursun-zoda.  She is 48 years old.  She is married.  Sanovarkhon is the mother of four children.  Her husband and son are farmers.  Her second son is abroad earning money.  Sanovarkhon is a hardworking and entrepreneurial woman.  She farms together with her family.  She has a plot of irrigated land to farm on.  Sanovarkhon has been planting gourds for 10 years.  She is taking out a loan for fertilizer to grow vegetables.  In the future, Sanovarkhon would like to use the income from her sales to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to grow vegetables

loans.name: Elena Regina

texts.es: La Sra. Elena  sigue con la actividad de la venta de comida  cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de una mescladora de cemento para la construcción de su casa,  en esta ocasión solicito el crédito para la compra de una carpa solar para cubrir su puesto de venta de comida,  ya que esta haciendo mucho frio, la Sra. Elena incremento su clientela y por ende sus ingresos económicos se siente feliz y agradecida por esta nueva oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Elena continues with her activity selling food.  She relates that she did well with her previous loan in that she used it to buy a cement mixer to build her house.  On this occasion she’s requested the loan to buy a sun shade to cover her food stand because it’s been very cold.  Elena increased her clientele and thus her income; she feels happy and grateful for this new opportunity she’s being given.

loans.use: to buy a sun shade.

loans.name: Maira Maricela

texts.es:
Maira es una mujer feliz, emprendedora, luchadora de 32 años de edad con un grado de educación secundario completa y una base universitaria no completada. Su relación con su pareja en unión libre de la cual tienen una hija y depende de ella y su pareja en todos los aspectos. Ella cuenta con el apoyo moral y económico de su compañero de hogar con el cual trabaja el área agrícola específicamente en la producción y cultivo de café. Ella aprendió a cultivar y sembrar café hace muchos años misma actividad enseñada por sus padres que ayudaron a que ella cumpliera su meta de estudiar y de culminarse en el nivel secundario. Ella es una mujer que ante sus vecinos familiares y amigos se ha caracterizado por su gran trayectoria como mujer trabajadora, luchadora, responsable y honesta. El terreno que ella y su pareja cultivan fue heredado por sus padres el cual está ubicado a 1 kilómetro de distancia de su casa de habitación al cual se traslada a pie.

Hoy en día solicita ayuda para mejorar su producción cafetalera comprando abono, Fertilizante y otros elementos que hacen del cultivo de café más sano y productivo para su venta en el mercado local ya que de esa manera podrá obtener mejores ingresos para su familia.

Su sueño es poder educar a su hija con una buena carrera universitaria que haga de ella una mejor persona cada día para que ella pueda tener el conocimiento para crear negocios o empresas que generen empleo y sean mejores cada día que pasa.
texts.en:
Maira is a happy, enterprising, hardworking, 32-year-old woman who completed secondary school and has had some university courses.  She’s in a common law relationship and has a daughter who is completely dependent on her and her spouse.  Her spouse gives her moral and economic support.  She and he work in agriculture, specifically growing and producing coffee.  She learned how to grow and plant coffee many years ago from her parents who helped her to reach her goal of becoming educated and graduating from secondary school.  She’s a woman who has been noted by her family members, friends and neighbors as being very hardworking, tenacious, responsible and honest.  The land she and her spouse cultivate was passed down to her from her parents and is located a kilometer away from their house; they reach it on foot.


Today, she’s asking for help to improve her coffee production buying manure, fertilizer and other supplies that lead to a healthier, more productive coffee crop to be sold in the local market so that she will earn higher income for her family this way.


Her dream is to be able to provide a good university career for her daughter that will make her a better person each day so that she will have the knowledge needed to create businesses or firms that will generate employment and that every day that passes they will be better.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Lucinda

texts.es: Lucinda, de 53 años es una mujer alegre. Vive en compañía de su esposo Alejandro con quien tiene 5 hijos pero solo vive con 2 de ellos en la casa que heredó de su madre.Como costumbre ancestral ella teje desde los 15 años de manera manual ya que no le gustan los equipos que hay en la actualidad pues afirma que el arte se lleva en el esfuerzo y trabajo. Comenta muy contenta que su principal ingreso económico se centra en la fabricación de las chompas, gorras, guantes y demás prendas a base de lana de alpaca.  La cuales comercializa en las diferentes ciudades de su región, además de exportar alguna prenda que piden las fabricas de exportación. Espera con mucha ilusión poder empezar con su propia cooperativa exportadora, donde cree podrá mostrar al mundo su arte.Este es el primer crédito con KIVA y agradece la oportunidad que le ofrecen para seguir progresando en su negocio además se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Lucinda, invertirá S/.500 soles en la compra de lana de alpaca.
texts.en:
Lucinda is a 53 year old, very joyful woman. She lives with her husband, with whom she has 5 children. Only two of their children live with them in the house that she inherited from her mother. Continuing on a family tradition, she knits by hand, which she has done since she was 15 years old. She doesn't like the knitting machines that many use currently, because she believes that the art is found in the effort and work that goes into it. 

She happily said that the majority of her income she receives from making sweaters, hats, gloves and other types of clothing from alpaca wool. She sells her goods in different cities nearby, as well as exporting a few that are requested by export factories. She has great hope that some day she will be able to start her own export cooperative, where she would be able to share her art with the world. 

This is the first loan she has taken out through KIVA. She is thankful for the opportunity that has been offered to her to continue progressing in her business. She promises to make her payments on time. Lucinda will invest 500 nuevo soles in the purchase of alpaca wool.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool.

loans.name: Abdulmalik

texts.ru: Абдулмалик житель района Кубадиян, расположенный на юге страны. Ему 47 лет. У него жена, две дочери и два сына. Абдулмалик намерен заняться торговым бизнесом. Рядом со своим домом он открыл магазин и хочет продавать там одежду и продукты питания. Однако, чтобы закупить товар он нуждается в кредите. С этим намерением он обратился за кредитом для закупа одежды и продуктов питания. Абдулмалик планирует закупать свой товар с оптового рынка города Душанбе, привозить в свой район и продавать в магазине по розничной цене. В ведении бизнеса ему будет помогать семья.
texts.en: Abdulmalik is a resident of the Qubadiyon region, located in the south of the country. He is 47 years old.  He has a wife, two daughters and two sons.  Abdulmalik is determined to start a retail business.  He opened a store next to his home and would like to sell clothing and food there.  However, in order to buy products he needs a loan.  With this goal he applied for a loan to buy clothing and food.  Abdulmalik plans to purchase his products at the wholesale market in Dushanbe and to bring them to his area and sell them in his store at retail prices.  His family will help him with his business.

loans.use: to buy clothing and food

loans.name: Muhamadi

texts.ru: Мухамади 52 года. Он женат и является отцом двоих дочерей. Оба его дочерей уже замужем и ведут самостоятельную жизнь. Мухамади со своей женой проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Он вместе с женой занимается растениеводством. У них имеется участок земли, на котором они выращивают овощи. Мухамади занимается этой сферой деятельности на протяжения пяти лет. Он запрашивает заем для закупа минерального удобрения для обработки земли. В дальнейшем Мухамади хочет расширить свою земледельческую деятельность.
texts.en: Muhamadi is 52 years old.  He is married and is the father of two daughters.  Both of his daughters are already married and lead independent lives.  Muhamadi and his wife live in the city of Tursun-zoda.  He farms with his wife.  They have a plot of land where they grow vegetables.  Muhamadi has been in this business for 5 years.  He is asking for a loan to purchase fertilizer to farm the land.  In the future Muhamadi would like to expand his farming business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to grow vegetables

loans.name: Camposeco Group

texts.es:
El señor Carlos Alberto es de estado civil casado, cuenta con 35 años de edad, curso 3 años de educación secundaria, tiene 4 hijos y todos estan estudiando, él se dedica a cultivar la tierra, dio inicio a este trabajo cuando dejo de estudiar y tuvo la necesidad de trabajar, hasta la fecha lleva ya 20 años de experiencia.

organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de insumos para agricultura, como: fertilizante, semillas, etc. En el futuro desea tener buenas y abundantes cosechas; los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a agricultura, específicamete cultivan café, maíz, frijol y tomate. Cabe mencionar que 1 de los integrantes del grupo no pudo asistir en la reunión cuando tomaron la foto, es por eso que en la foto solo aparecen 8 integrantes.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is married and 35-years-old.  He completed three years of secondary school.  He has four children who are all attending school.  He works cultivating the land.  He started this work when he left school and needed to work.  To date he has 20 years’ experience.  He organizes a group and requests a loan he’ll use to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, etc.  In future, he wants to have good and abundant harvests.

The other group members work in agriculture, specifically growing coffee, corn, beans and tomatoes.  It’s worth mentioning that one of the group members was unable to attend the meeting when the photo was taken which is why only 8 members appear in the photo.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Roxana

texts.es: Roxana, de 24 años de edad es una madre luchadora. Vive en compañía de su esposo Marcos y su pequeño hijo de 4 años respectivamente con quienes vive en la casa de su suegra. Como mujer emprendedora, aprendió a mezclar el arte con el negocio y sus conocimientos con el tejido la ayudaron a abrir una tienda de ropa en el centro de la ciudad . Comenta que ahí vende también sus propias creaciones, entre ropa tejida manualmente con lana de alpaca la cual es muy cotizada. Afirma que este negocio la ayudó a mejorar sus ingresos económicos, pues cada día más personas desean vestir con esta lana. Además de incrementar el negocio de ropa de hilo y tela por ahora espera poder mejorar sus ingresos y continuar con la venta de ropa.Este es el primer crédito con KIVA y agradece la oportunidad que le ofrecen para seguir progresando con su negocio además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Roxana, invertirá los S/.1000 soles en la compra de ropa para niños y adultos para luego ponerlas en venta.
texts.en:
Roxana, 24, is a hardworking mother.  She lives in the company of her husband, Marcos, and their little 4-year-old son in her mother-in-law’s house.  As an enterprising woman, she learned how to mix art and business and her knitting skills helped her open a clothing store in the city center.  She comments that she also sells her own creations there among which are hand-woven alpaca wool clothes that are highly sought-after.  She affirms that this business helped her improve her income because more people want to wear this type of wool every day.  In addition to increasing her business of knitwear and fabric clothes she also hopes to improve her income and continue to sell clothes.

This is her first Kiva loan and she’s grateful for the opportunity she’s being offered to continue making business progress; she promises to be punctual with her installment payments.  Roxana will use the 1,000 soles to buy clothes for children and adults to resell.

loans.use: to buy clothes for adults and children.

loans.name: Haider

texts.es: Hayder de 23 años de edad, se dedica a la preparación y vetas de comidas rápidas, oficio con el que generó su propia manera de generar ingresos, desde el mes de Marzo de año 2008 cuando de su padre heredó y adicionalmente trabajó como empleado en negocios con las mismas características. Finalmente con sus ahorros y con el apoyo de su familia emprendió su propia aventura de negocios, en el cual trabaja desde las 5 de la tarde, hasta las 12 de la noche, durante los días jueves, viernes, sábados domingos y feriados en los cuales hace su oferta de productos a sus principales clientes que son sus vecinos, y transeúntes que por allí circundan. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará  un horno asador de 12 pollos al carbón, con esta inversión ampliará su gama de productos pues actualmente solo vende pizza y hamburguesas. Su meta es lograr reconocimiento en el sector objeto de mercadeo y terminar estudios profesionales pues actualmente se encuentra en el nivel de bachillerato.
texts.en:
Hayder, 23, works making and selling fast-food, an occupation that generated his own way of earning income as of March, 2008 when he inherited it from his father; he also worked as an employee in similar firms.  Finally, with his savings and with family support he started his own business venture where he works from 5 in the afternoon until midnight Thursday, Friday, Saturday, Sunday and holidays.  He sells his products to his main customers who are his neighbors and passersby.

He’s applying for a Kiva loan, his first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to buy a 12-chicken charcoal roaster.  With this investment he will widen his scope of products because he currently only sells hamburgers and pizza.  His goal is to become well-known in the marketplace and to complete his professional training because he’s currently still finishing high-school.

loans.use: to buy a 12-chicken charcoal roaster.

loans.name: Guram

texts.en:
Guram is a 43-year-old artisan. He lives in Zestaponi district with his wife, retired mother, son, daughter-in-law, and an infant grandchild. He is working on private orders for construction to earn a small monthly salary, which is rarely enough to feed his 6-member family. Their additional income is Guram’s mother’s small monthly pension.

Guram requested a loan from local financial institutions several times to start up a family business, but without any success. His loan request was rejected every time because of low income and the family’s poor living conditions.

Guram also requested a loan from Credo to start up a family business. Guram has now been approved for a loan within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages provision of business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to rural poor people, who do not have access to credit products. Such rural poor people are regarded as “high-risk borrowers” because of their low income. Guram will use the loan amount to purchase a cement-block bottling machine and raw materials. He wants to start producing cement blocks and sell them locally.

Guram is a very hardworking man, and the loan will give him an opportunity to develop the new business and increase his family's income. As he is experienced in the construction business and knows a lot of people around, he will be able to sell good numbers of blocks and earn a profit. He will reinvest part of the profit in the same field and expand the business and will use another part for his family's well-being. He will be able to improve their living conditions with the increased income.

loans.use: To start producing cement blocks by purchasing a cement-block bottling machine and raw materials

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy more clothing for her business

loans.name: Mbula

texts.en:
Mbula has been running a business selling fruits and vegetables for years. Her goal is to become a leading fruit vending business in the area in order to raise her profits.

For that reason, she plans to use the 30,000 KES loan to purchase green vegetables and sacks of fruit such as oranges, mangoes, watermelons, and pawpaw. She decided to join Yehu to receive financial support.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables and sacks of fruit such as oranges, mangoes, watermelons, and pawpaw

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, de 41 años de edad , es una mujer trabajadora. Enviudó hace 2 años aproximadamente, desde entonces cuidó sola de sus 3 hijos en la casa que heredó de su madre hace 18 años.Desde muy joven aprendió a manejar con mucha cautela los trabajos de fabricación de ladrillos, pues nació y creció en el ceno de está actividad además comenta que desde niña demostró ser una mujer perseverante pues soñaba con tener su propia fábrica.Cuando formó su familia abrió una fábrica pequeña la que hoy en día es una de las más grandes de la zona, comenta que realiza varios millares durante el mes y hasta los comercializa en distintos pueblos cercanos a su localidad. Ahora solo desea mejorar la calidad de sus ladrillos, ya que desea mejorar sus ventas a instituciones privadas muy rigurosas.Este es el primer crédito con KIVA y agradece la oportunidad que le ofrecen para seguir progresando en su negocio.Jesús, invertirá los S/. 1000 soles en la compra de arcilla , la cual utiliza en la fabricación de los ladrillos.
texts.en:
Jesús, who is 41 years old, is a very hard working woman. She has been a widow for two years, at which time she started taking care of her three children on her own. They live in the house she inherited from her mother 18 years ago. When she was very young she learned how to make bricks with much care. She was born and raised, being surrounded by this type of activity. 

She told us that since she was a young girl she proved herself to be a persistent woman and dreamed of having her own brick factory. When she started her family, she opened a small factory which today is now one of the biggest factories in the area. She said that she makes a few thousand bricks a month and sells them in in various cities close to her home. Now she wants to improve the quality of the bricks, which would help her to increase sales in private institutions. 

This is the first loan she has taken out through KIVA. She is thankful for the opportunity she has been offered to continue moving forward with her business. Jesús will invest 1000 nuevo soles in the purchase of clay, which she will use to make bricks.

loans.use: to by clay to make bricks.

loans.name: Elizabeth Celina

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una joven de 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad de clima variado y en el cual se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de manzana, maíz, entre otros. Elizabeth es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades que se pueden presentar.

Día a día Elizabeth trabaja como obrera en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya con los gastos de su hogar; ella cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y sobre todo tiene ganas de salir adelante.

Elizabeth está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá refaccionar las paredes de la cocina de su vivienda ya que estas son de adobe y están muy resquebrajadas, de esta manera podrá brindarle más seguridad a su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Estudiar la carrera de enfermería y tener una pequeña farmacia”.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a young, 19-year-old living in the city of Imperial, a city of variable climate where agriculture, especially apple and corn growing, is common.  Elizabeth is a young woman who very much wants to get ahead despite adversities that may arise.

Elizabeth works day to day as a laborer on a large agricultural estate in her city; she works about 9 hours daily and is able to contribute to her home’s expenses with the fruit of her labor.  She believes she’s doing well because she’s responsible and above all she wants to get ahead.

Elizabeth is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they are giving her she will be able to repair the walls in her kitchen because they are adobe and they are quite cracked.  In this way she’ll be able to provide more security for her family and continue striving to make her greatest dream reality: to study nursing and to own a small pharmacy.

loans.use: to buy a gas stove.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his store.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda, de 34 años de edad es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de su esposo José con quien tiene 4 hijos a los que cuida en una casa alquilada desde hace 10 años.“Trabajo en muchas labores, soy mil oficios”, afirma.Nilda comienza el día comprado carne al por mayor para después comercializarlos a los vendedores de carne de los distintos mercados de la ciudad. Afirma que este trabajo le resulta productivo pues la carne es consumida por todos y le pagan al instante,además se dedica a la venta de queso.Este es el primer crédito con KIVA y agradece la oportunidad que le ofrecen para seguir progresando en su negocio. Promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues siempre ha sido una persona honesta y responsable.Nilda, invertirá los S/.1000 soles en la compra de carne al por mayor.
texts.en:
Nilda, 34, is an unassuming woman.  She lives with her husband, José, with whom she has four children she cares for in a house she’s rented for the last 10 years.  “I work at many things, I’m a Jane of All Trades,” she affirms.  

Nilda starts her day buying meat at wholesale to then sell it to meat merchants in various markets in the city.  She affirms that this is productive work because meat is consumed by everyone and she’s paid instantly.  She also sells cheese.

This is her first Kiva loan and she’s grateful for the opportunity she’s being offered to continue making business progress.  She promises to be punctual with her payments for she’s always been an honest, responsible person.  Nilda will use the 1,000 soles to buy meat at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy meat at wholesale.

loans.name: Dalal

texts.en:
Dalal is a 48-year-old married woman and mother of three children. She has been selling food and home products for thirteen years. She sells sweets, canned food, cold beverages, and oils. She also sells home products such as cups, trays, and plates. Her business is doing just fine due to the diversity of products; she is sure that she is creating the need for other items by attracting customers' attention to her displays.

Dalal is applying for her second loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua; she seeks to support her business with newly released home products and summer beverages. Her previous loan was also invested in her business and had a very good impact.

Dalal hopes to keep on expanding and diversifying her products and increasing her income at the same time.

loans.use: To support her business with newly released home products and summer beverages

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es: Doña ana se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años y eso le ha dado la capacidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maíz, frijol y maicillo cuando ya esta lista su cosecha la almacena en los sacos que muestra la fotografía para luego salir y comercializarla en agencias de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos, doña Ana está solicitando un crédito para poder comparar insumos agrícolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y así poder tener mejores ganancias y seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitación.
texts.en:
Ana has made a living in agriculture for several years, which has given her the ability and knowledge she needs to take care of her crops.  Her main crops are corn, beans, and sorghum.  When her harvest is ready she stores it in the sacks shown in the photograph, then goes out to sell it to the basic grain agencies near her house.

With the profits from her sales she helps with her family expenses.  She lives with her husband and her two children.

Ana's requesting a loan to be able to buy agricultural inputs to help her grow her crops: soil amendments, seed, and fertilizer.  This way she'll have better profits and continue helping with the household expenses without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, seed, fertilizer, etc.

loans.name: Jorge Otilio

texts.es: Don Jorge  de  50 años de edad es un hombre trabajador, responsable y muy amable actualmente vive con su familia en casa propia, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como: maíz y fríjol también trabaja de  jornalero en una finca que está cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con el pago de su trabajo logar solventar los gastos de su hogar. Don Jorge solicita financiamiento para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, etc.  para que las cosechas sean de las mejores y asi el pueda seguir llevando el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
Jorge, 50, is a hardworking, responsible, very kind man who lives with his family in his own house.  He works growing basic grains like corn and beans and also works as a laborer at a farm near his house.  With profits from his sales and with his salary from his job he’s able to cover his household expenses.

Jorge is asking for financing to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, manure, seeds, etc. so that his crops will be among the best and he will be able to continue providing daily sustenance for his home.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Doña Mayra de 30 años de edad  es una persona humilde y muy trabajadora vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos quienes estudian actualmente, tiene un negocio de ferretería la cual posee desde hace varios años, tiene mucha experiencia en el negocio por lo cual manifiesta que las ganancias que le generan son muy buenas, Doña Mayra solicita un crédito para la compra de pinturas, clavos, tornillos, clavos, etc.  todo por mayor, y asi pueda surtir su ferretería para que le genera más ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mayra, 30, is a humble, very hardworking person living in her own house with her life companion and their two children who are currently attending school.  She has had a hardware store for several years and she has much business experience so she states that profits are very good.  Mayra is asking for a loan to buy paint, nails, screws, etc. at wholesale to stock the hardware store so that it will generate more profits and she can give her family better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy paint, nails, screws, etc. at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy spare parts for her husband's rickshaw

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en:
Domingo is married and has 3 children. They live in Lupagan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

To earn a living, he is planting rice on his land, earning 6,000 PHP each month. As a new member of GDMPC, he is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure in order to improve his farm's production. 

He hopes and dreams that in the future, his children will be sent to school and will be able to finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Maria Luz

texts.es:
Maria tiene 49 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Nazca, ciudad de clima muy cálido y poseedora de lugares turísticos muy hermosos. Maria es madre de un hijo de 22años de edad, por el cual ha luchado mucho desde que nació ya que tenía pocos recursos económicos y por ello atravesó muchos momentos difíciles al lado de su esposo, quien trabaja como obrero de construcción y quien la apoya mucho en todo lo que ella hace.

Día a día Maria trabaja como agricultora, en su pequeña parcela ha sembrado maíz morado, el cual se emplea para elaborar nuestra bebida nacional, la cual es la chicha morada, Maria trabaja alrededor de 6 horas al día ya	 que está al pendiente del cultivo; Maria cree que está saliendo adelante por su dedicación.

Maria está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado podrá comprar abono, fertilizantes, así como también gastos de regadío, de esta manera podrá tener una mejor cosecha y podrá mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, para así seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un terreno propio para cultivar”.
texts.en:
Maria is 49 years old and lives in the city of Nazca, a city with a warm climate and beautiful tourist attractions.  Maria is the mother of a 22 year old for whom she has worked hard since his birth, since they had few economic resources and had to get through many difficult times with her husband who works in construction and who supports her in all of her endeavors.

Daily, Maria works as a farmer.  On her small plot, she has planted purple corn, which is used to make the national drink, "Chicha Morada".  Maria works about 6 hours a day since she pays close attention to her crops.  Maria believes that she is doing well because of her dedication.

Maria is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she will be able to purchase manure and fertilizers, and cover the costs of watering her crops.  This will allow her to have a better harvest and improve her revenue and her quality of life in order to keep striving to realize her dream of having her own property to grow.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Aguilar Group

texts.es:
El señor Aurelio es de estado civil casado, tiene 36 años de dad, curso los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos y 1 de ellos está estudiando, él se dedica a la compra y venta de gallinas criollas, inició este negocio comprando 5 gallinas y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo y solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de gallinas para criarlas y luego venderlas, en el futuro cercano desea que con el prestamo que le concedan pueda ampliar su negocio, los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio y a la venta de pollos. En la fotografia aprecen 9 integrantes, pero solamente a 8 de ellos se les concedió el préstamo.
texts.en:
Aurelio is 36 years old, and he is married.  He has a sixth grade education.  His has five children, and one of them is in school.  He buys and sells creole chickens.  He started this business by purchasing five chickens, and he now has three years of experience.

He organizes a group and is requesting a loan.  He will use the loan to buy chickens to raise and later sell.  In the near future he hopes that with the loan he will be able to expand his business.

The other members of the group are involved in businesses and sell chickens.  There are nine members in the photograph, but only eight of them were granted the loan.

loans.use: to buy and sell chickens.

loans.name: Ana Gloria

texts.es: Ana de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y fríjol, desde hace 10 años y eso le ha dado la experiencia necesaria para asistir sus cultivos, sus cosechas las comercializa en los mercados de granaos basicos y compras de hortalizas con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar. Ana solicita un crédito para poder mejorar el terreno donde piensa hacer su siembra y comprar los insumos necesarios como fertilizantes, herbicidas, abonos, entre otras cosas para tener buenas cosechas y asi ella pueda obtener  mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica
texts.en:
Ana, 34 years old, lives in her own home with her partner. She grows corn and beans, and has been doing so for 10 years, which has given her the necessary experience to care for her crops.  She sells her harvest in the markets, and with the earnings is able to cover their household expenses.  

Ana is requesting a loan in order to improve the land where she plans to plant her crops, and purchase the necessary supplies such as fertilizers, herbicides and compost among other things to improve her harvest.  With this, she will be able to increase her earnings and give her family more financial security.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, herbicides, compost, etc...

loans.name: Rosalío

texts.es:
Rosalío es un señor casado de 27 años quien tiene 3 hijos 2 mujeres y 1 hombre quienes actualmente viven en Sololá.
El se dedica a la agricultura y lo viene realizando desde hace 10 años,  eligió esta actividad porque obtiene ingresos aceptables atreves de su cultivo, y de esta manera contribuye al sustento familiar.
El esta solicitando un préstamo de Q4,500.00 para capital de trabajo para cultivo de cebolla.
Su sueño es comprar un terreno para cultivar más y por medio de sus ingresos remodelar su casa,  para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Rosalío, age 27, is a married man.  He has three children, two girls and one boy, who now live in Solola.

He has been farming for ten years.  He chose this business activity because he gets acceptable income through his crop.  This way he contributes to supporting the family.

He is requesting a loan for 4,500 GTQ for working capital for his onion crop.  His dream is to buy a piece of land in order to cultivate more.  Through his income he will remodel his house in order to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to have working capital for his onion crop.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es: Don Rigoberto de 53 años de edad vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en casa de su propiedad y desde hace muchos años que se dedica a la agricultura la cual es su principal fuente de ingresos, siembra maíz y frijol con lo que gana de sus cosechas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar. El quiere comprar los insumos necesarios para sus cosechas como abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, etc. pero dado que no cuenta con los recursos económicos necesarios para dicha inversión ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito ya que solo de esta forma puede continuar su proceso de cultivo. Al igual que todo campesino, deposita su confianza en la agricultura ya que no poseen otra fuente de ingresos y desea superarse haciendo lo mejor que puede en sus cultivos. Espera obtener una cosecha abundante que le permita seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar y cancelar dicho crédito
texts.en:
Rigoberto, 53 years old, lives with his wife and their three children in their own home.  He has worked in agriculture for many years and it is his main source of income.  He grows corn and beans, and with the earnings from his harvest he is able to cover some of his household expenses.  

He wants to purchase the necessary supplies for his crops such as compost, fertilizers, seeds, etc...  However, since he does not have the necessary funds for this investment, he has decided to request a loan because it is the only way for him to continue his farming.  Like all other farmers, he places his trust in agriculture as he possesses no other source of income, and he hopes to overcome and do the best he can with his crops.  He hopes to have an abundant harvest which will allow him to continue to put food on the table and repay his loan.

loans.use: to purchase compost, fertilizers, seed, etc...

loans.name: Azima

texts.ru: Азима жительница города Турсунзаде. Ей 49 лет. Она замужем и у нее пятеро детей. Ее муж работает за пределами страны, старший сын работает шофером, невестка занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Сама Азима работала продавщицей на протяжении двух лет. Последние 13 лет Азима занимается вышиванием. У нее среднее техническое образование. Она очень опытная портниха, она шьет не только женские платья, но и национальные одеяла. Азима принимает заказы у себя на дому. Азима запрашивает кредит для закупа тканей. В будущем она планирует расширить свою деятельность и открыть ателье.
texts.en: Azima is a resident of the city of Tursun-zoda.  She is 49 years old, married and has five children.  Her husband works abroad, the oldest son works as a driver, and daughter-in-law is invovled in sewing national dresses.  Azima spent two years working as a salesperson.  Azima has been involved in embroidery for the last 13 years.  She has a secondary technical education.  She is a very experienced seamstress and sews not only women's dresses, but national blankets as well.  Azima accepts orders at her home.  Azima is requesting this loan to purchase fabrics.  In the future, she plans to expand her business and open an atelier.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics for embroidery

loans.name: Almagul

texts.ru:
Алмагул  52 года, воспитала дочь. Алмагул в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад с  покупки скота на 60,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Алмагул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  3 головы крупного рогатого скота с приплодом, 5 голов мелкого скота, 1,20 арендованной земли, где выращивает ячмень, пшеницу .  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Алмагул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки крупного рогатого скота и ядохимикатов для удобрения земли.  Доходы от кредита Алмагул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а  в будущем  мечтает увеличить бизнес за счет открытия маленького продуктового магазина.
texts.en: Almagul is 52 years old and raised a daughter.  To provide the primary source of income for her family, Almagul is involved in animal husbandry, having started this business nine years ago with a purchase of livestock for 60,000 som.  Thanks to Almagul's persistent work, today her business contains three cattle with offspring, five small livestock, and 1.20 hectares of leased land, where she grows barley and wheat.  In order to further develop her business, Almagul requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy cattle and pesticides for treating the land.  She plans to use the earnings from the loan to invest into a further increase of domestic livestock and dreams of growing her business by opening a small food market in the future.

loans.use: to buy cattle and pesticides for treating the land

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.ru: Дилфуза 43-летняя замужняя женщина. У нее двое детей, которые учатся в средней школе. Муж Дилфузы работает в военкомате Турснзадевского района. Сама Дилфуза занимается торговым бизнесом. На рынке у нее имеется торговая точка, где она продает мужское нижнее белье, женские колготки и носки. Она занимается этим бизнесом в течение 9 лет. Дилфуза сейчас нуждается в кредите чтобы увеличить товарооборот. Она запрашивает кредит для закупа товара (мужского нижнего белья, женских колготок и носков). В будущем Дилфуза планирует расширить бизнес и открыть еще одну точку продажи.
texts.en: Dilfuza is a 43 year-old married woman.  She has two children, who attend a secondary school.  Dilfuza's husband works at a military recruitment office of the Tursun-zoda district.  Dilfuza is involved in a retail business.  She has a retail outlet at a market, where she sells men's undergarments, women's stockings and socks.  She has been involved in this business for nine years.  Dilfuza currently needs a loan to increase goods turnover.  She is requesting a loan to purchase merchandise (men's undergarments, women's stockings and socks).  In the future, Dilfuza plans to expand her business and open another retail outlet.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise (men's undergarments, women's stockings and socks)

loans.name: Natalya

texts.ru:
Наталья замужем. У нее есть семнадцатилетняя дочь. Наталья вместе с мужем имеет бизнес.

Наталья занимается выращиванием овощей на своем участке на протяжении 15 лет. Наиболее продаваемыми являются помидоры, огурцы и редис. Начинали свой бизнес очень бедно, но позже все наладилось. Наталья ответственная, общительная и приветливая. Она хочет развивать бизнес, и в следующем году сделать отопление в теплице.

Наталья просит предоставить ей кредит  в сумме 10000 гривен на удобрения(3 тыс. гривен),  ремонт теплицы(1 тыс. гривен), химикаты(3 тыс. гривен), бензин (1 тыс. гривен) и зарплата рабочим (2 тыс. гривен).
texts.en:
Natalya is married. She has a 17-year old daughter. Natalya and her husband own a business growing vegetables on their land plot. Natalya has been doing this for 15 years. Tomatoes, cucumbers and radishes are particularly in demand. They have launched this business with very modest means, but  eventually things picked up. Natalya is responsible,  outgoing and friendly. She would like to develop her business further and install heating in her greenhouse next year.

Natalya is requesting a loan in the amount of 10,000 UAH in order to buy fertilizers (3,000 UAH); do greenhouse repairs (1,000 UAH); buy chemicals (3,000 UAH) and fuel (1,000 UAH) and pay workers (2,000 UAH).

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and fuel, perform minor greenhouse repairs, and pay the workers' salary in a timely fashion.

loans.name: Wilmer Ulises

texts.es:
Wilmer, solicita un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de capital de trabajo para seguir invirtiendo en el cultivo de granos básicos; este le permitirá comprar insumos agrícolas tales como: abono, insecticidas, plaguicidas, pesticidas, herbicidas.
El crédito anterior le ayudo a aumentar la productividad, los ingresos han incrementado y con ellos a aportado a su familia para los gastos necesarios; las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares han mejorado.
texts.en:
Wilmer is requesting a new loan because he needs operating capital so that he can continue investing in his basic grain crops. The money will enable him to buy farming supplies such as compost, insecticides, pesticides, and herbicides.

His previous loan helped to increase his productivity. Wilmer’s income increased and he was able to support his family with the necessary expenses. His financial condition and family circumstances have also improved.

loans.use: to buy compost, insecticides, pesticides, and herbicides.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposa. Él se dedica al cultivo de maiz y frijol desde hace varios años. De esta forma es como se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. La actividad del cultivo la realiza año con año, y es la única forma que conoce de como ganarse la vida. Es un hombre muy trabajador, honrado y responsable. A pesar de las condiciones en las que vive, las cuales son muy humildes no se cansa de trabajar y de dar lo mejor a su familia. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito para comprar los principales insumos agrícolas: abonos, venenos para plagas, semillas, etc. Espera tener resultados favorables ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Confía en Dios que logrará obtener una cosecha abundante la cual le permitirá seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en:
The client lives in his own house with his wife.  He has made a living for several years growing corn and beans.  This is how he puts food on the table in his household every day.  He grows his crops year after year and it's the only way he knows how to earn a living.

He's a very hardworking, honorable, and responsible man.  Despite his very modest living conditions, he never tires of working and giving his family the best.

He made the decision to request a loan to buy the main agricultural inputs: soil amendments, pesticide, seed, etc.

He hopes to have favorable results because he has no other source of income.  He trusts in God that he'll manage to get an abundant crop that will allow him to continue to put food on his table every day.

loans.use: to buy soil amendments, pesticide, seed, etc.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio tiene 52 años de edad, pero tiene el espíritu de un joven de 20 años, ya que es muy alegre. Julio vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, se encuentra en el norte del País, y es una ciudad con un clima maravilloso, tiene muchos lugares turísticos y sobre todo una gastronomía variada sobre todo uno de sus platillos más conocidos es el riquísimo “Arroz con pato”.
 
Día a día Julio trabaja en su pequeño negocio de fabricación y venta de ladrillos, el labora alrededor de 10 horas al día ya que este trabaja es su única fuente de ingresos y con la cual puede sacar adelante a su familia ya que es padre de 3 hijos; Julio cree que está saliendo adelante ya que es honrado y desea darle lo mejor a su familia.

Julio está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá construir el techo de su vivienda ya que actualmente su techo es de esteras y más aun ha nacido su último hijo y tan solo tiene 2 meses de nacido, de esta manera ella podrá darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y poder seguir luchando para poder hacer su gran sueño realidad:” Terminar de construir su vivienda”.
texts.en:
Julio is 52 years old, but because he is very happy, he has the spirit of a 20-year-old. He lives in the city of Guadalupe, which is located in the north of the country. Guadalupe has an excellent climate, with many places of interest to tourists, and above all, a varied cuisine – one of the most well known dishes of which is the delicious “Arroz con pato” [Rice with duck].

Each day Julio works in his small business of manufacturing and selling bricks. He works around 10 hours each day, because this business is his only source of income with which he provides for his family of three children. Julio believes that he is getting ahead because he is honest and he wants to give the best to his family.

Julio is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because it is thanks to their help that he will be able to put a new roof on his house. He says he needs a new roof because his current roof is made only of woven mats, and moreover, his youngest child was just born is only two months old. With this loan he says he will be able to improve his family’s quality of life and continue striving for his greatest dream, which is to finish the construction of his house.

loans.use: to put a new roof on his house.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos es una señora casada de 53 años quien tiene 9 hijos quienes viven en Sololá.
Ella  se dedica desde hace 30 años a la compraventa de verduras en el mercado local de Sololá. Eligio esta actividad porque obtiene ingresos aceptables y de esta manera aporta a  la economía familiar.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo de Q 5,000.00  para capital de trabajo para la compraventa de verduras.
Su sueño con sacar adelante a sus hijos para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida en un futuro.
texts.en:
Santos, age 53, is married and has nine children.  They live in Sololá.  She has been selling vegetables at the local market in Sololá for 30 years.  She chose this business activity because she gets acceptable income, and this way she contributes to the family finances.

She is requesting a loan for 5,000 GTQ for working capital to buy and sell vegetables.

Her dream is to get her children ahead and to provide them with a better quality of life in the future.

loans.use: to buy and sell vegetables.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es: Antonio de 54 años de edad vive con esposa y sus dos  hijos en casa propia, antonio es un hombre trabajador, responsable, desde hace varios años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside y también a la siembra de maíz y frijol. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos,  ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas y concentrado para el ganado y  así poder seguirle dando a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en:
Antonio, 54, lives with his wife and his two children in his own house.  He's a hardworking and responsible man.

Antonio has worked for several years producing and selling dairy products and growing corn and beans in the area where he lives.  He has very good customers because he has learned how to earn their trust.  He offers quality and good prices in his products.

He has decided to invest in taking care of his livestock because his business depends on it.  This is why he requested a loan to buy vitamins and feed for his livestock, so he can continue giving his family a better quality of life without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and feed for livestock

loans.name: Rolito

texts.en:
Rolito is a hardworking farmer from the town of San Miguel, Bohol. Rolito has been engaged in a rice farming business for more than 5 years now. This is the source of his income.

Rolito is asking for a loan to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for the farm. With these materials, he will be able to improve his farm, most especially his harvest. In the future, Rolito dreams of expanding his farm so that it will generate more revenue necessary for the daily needs of the family, especially for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy seedlings, fertilizer and pesticides for the farm.

loans.name: Rosalba De Jesús

texts.es:
Rosalba de 48 años de edad, es madre soltera de dos hijos. Su situación económica siempre ha sido su mayor dificultad, por lo cual ha trabajado fuertemente para brindarles una vida digna y una buena educación a sus hijos. 
Asegura que la gastronomía ha sido una de sus grandes pasiones, pero debido al factor económico sus sueños siempre se vieron inalcanzables.
Hoy su mentalidad ha cambiado y aunque sabe que no tiene dinero, sus ganas de salir adelante se han antepuesto, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para pagar la capacitación en cocina express y montar su propio negocio. 
Sueña con crecer dentro del sector de comidas rápidas y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosalba, 48, is the single mother of two children. Her economic situation has always been her greatest challenge, which is why she has worked hard to offer her children a decent life and good education. She says that gastronomy has been one of her biggest passions, but due to economic factors her dreams have always been seen as unattainable. 

Today her mentality has changed and even though she knows she does not have the money, her desire to get ahead has taken precedence, which is why she finds herself requesting a loan to pay for training in express cooking so she can start her own business. She dreams of growing within the fast food sector and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for training in express cooking

loans.name: Ramón

texts.es:
Ramón tiene 68 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es una persona que hace 50 años realiza trabajos agrícolas, hoy en día lo hace en compañía de su hijo.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para reparar el tractor que posee y con el cual trabaja la tierra y la otra parte la utilizara para reparar el cerco donde se encuentra sus cultivos. De esta manera, Ramón podrá brindar a sus clientes un buen servicio, porque con el tractor prepara la tierra de otras personas que pagan por sus servicios. Teniendo su fuente se ingresos segura, podrá brindarles a su hijos lo mejor como educación, salud y vivienda.
texts.en:
Ramón is 68 years old, he is married and he has two children. He has been a farmer for 50 years, and today he works with his son.

A part of the loan he is requesting to Fundación Campo will be used to repair the tractor he owns and that he uses to work on his land; another part will be used to repair the fence around his crops. Ramón will thus succeed in offering a good service to his customers, as he also uses his tractor to prepare other farmers’ lands and he gets paid for this service. Having a steady source of income he will succeed in granting his children the best education, good health and better living conditions.

loans.use: To rapair his tractor and the fence around his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El cliente vive en Guayaquil. Empezó en su casa vendiendo recargas telefonicas, luego comenzó a vender en el centro de la ciudad y le gusto tanto que continuo con el negocio de venta de recargas telefonicas ya que cada recarga el gana $25.00 y el hace al dia un aproximado de 300 recargas, también a los amigos y familiares les vende artículos de hogar.

La dificultad que el tiene es la a veces su enfermedad que no la deja laborar de la manera correcta ya que el es pvvs (persona viviendo con vih sida).

Es soltera, no tiene hijos. Con el préstamo quiere comprar recargas y artículos para el hogar. Su sueño es tener un local con accesorios y recargas poder vender  sus productos y disfrutar junto a su familia.
texts.en:
This borrower lives in Guayaquil.  He started selling rechargeable phone cards from home, but later began selling them in the central part of the city.  The borrower would like to continue his business of selling rechargeable phone cards since he earns $25 from the sale of each card.  On a given day, he can approximately 300 rechargeable phone cards.  He also sells household goods to friends and relatives.

The difficulty he faces occasionally is not being able to work in a proper manner because of his illness.  He is an individual who lives with HIV/AIDS.  The borrower is single and has no children.  With this loan, he will buy rechargeable phone cards and household goods.  His dream is to have an accessories and rechargeable phone card shop where he can sell his products.  He also wants to enjoy being with his family.

loans.use: to buy household goods and rechargeable phone cards to sell.

loans.name: Jose  Maria

texts.es: Jose es un hombre muy responsable con sus obligaciones de hogar, ya que siempre se ha caracterizado por brindarle lo mejor a su familia. Actualmente vive junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos de 8, 6 y 3 años de edad,  se dedica a ser agricultor siembra maíz y también trabaja de jornal en una finca que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y el pago de su trabajo logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar. Jose  desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso a solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, entre otras cosas, para seguir llevando el pan de cada día a su hogar.
texts.en: Jose is a very responsible man when it comes to his household obligations, as his main characteristic has always been providing the best to his family. He currently lives with his wife and their 3 children ages 8, 6 and 3. He is a corn farmer and he also works as a day laborer in a farm located close to his community. He succeeds in paying for his household’s expenses thanks to the income he earns from his sales and the salary from his job. Jose wants to increase his sales and for this reason he has requested a loan that he will use to buy seeds, manure, fertilizers and other products in order to keep on providing his family with their basic necessities on a daily basis.

loans.use: To buy seeds, manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Dairo Alberto

texts.es:
Dairo de 40 años de edad, se dedica a la elaboración de nuggest de pollo, actividad que desea convertir en un proyecto de negocio de mayor magnitud. Razón por la cual, desea recibir asesoría especializada en la creación de empresas en conjunto con su amigo Andrés quien es su compañero de universidad y su futuro socio.
Sueña con posicionar su negocio y convertirlo en una gran empresa que le proporcione una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y le garantice una educación de calidad a su hijo.
texts.en:
Dairo is 40 years old and has a venture of making chicken nuggets.  He wants to convert this project into a business of a much larger magnitude.  For this reason, he wants to obtain specialized training on how to create a business with his friend Andrés, who is also a university classmate and future partner.  

Dairo dreams of positioning his business and turning it into a large enterprise so that he can provide a better quality of life for his family and guarantee a quality education for his child.

loans.use: to pay for specialized business training.

loans.name: Ronanisa

texts.en:
Ronanisa is a seaweed farmer from the town of Bien Unido, Bohol. She is a married woman and has three children. Ronanisa has been in the business for more than five years now. She helps her husband in their venture.

Ronanisa is asking for a loan to buy more seaweed seedlings. With a loan, she will be able to improve her business and augment her income. Ronanisa dreams of making their seaweed business a sustainable one.

loans.use: to buy more seaweed seedlings.

loans.name: Jose Rosalio

texts.es: Jose, tiene 49 años de edad, es casado, tiene 5 hijos y vive en una aldea del municipio de Jesús de Otoro, Comayagua. El se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, donde produce y vende café. Esta producción la vende en el mercado local.  Esta solicitando un tercer préstamo que es por 16,000 lempiras  con el cual va continuar con el mantenimiento a su finca de café, comprara fertilizantes y abonos para poder sacar mejor producción. Su plan de mantener asistida su finca es para poder ayudar a sus hijos con las necesidades básicas.
texts.en:
Jose, age 49, is married and has five children.  He lives in a village in the Jesús de Otoro municipality in Comayagua.

He has been farming for ten years.  He produces and sells coffee.  He sells this production at the local market.

He is requesting a third loan for 16,000 lempiras, which he will use for maintenance of his coffee farm.  He will buy fertilizers and manure in order to be able to get better production.  His plan to keep up his farm is to be able to help his children with the basic needs.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizers for the maintenance of his coffee farm.

loans.name: Warner

texts.es: Warner es un joven emprendedor y esforzado es padre de dos niños,  y el suyo es el único ingreso familiar, trabaja en servicio express en varios restaurantes locales, por lo que necesita tener motocicleta propia ya que la que está usando es alquilada, para comprar la motocicleta necesita quinientos cincuenta mil colones (¢550.000), de este modo  Warner podrá ofrecer sus servicios en más lugares comerciales.
texts.en: Warner is a young, dedicated entrepreneur; he’s the father of two children and he is the only wage-earner in the family.  He works making express deliveries for various local restaurants so he needs a motorcycle of his own since the one he’s been using is leased.  In order to buy a motorcycle he needs five-hundred-and-fifty thousand colones (¢550.000).  Warner will be able to provide his services to more commercial firms this way.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Lafia Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Lafia est composé de sept  femmes qui sont majoritairement des mariées et monogames. Elles ont en moyenne 34 ans et 3 enfants. Elles habitent toutes dans la ville de Ségou (4ème Région administrative du Mali) et se sont connues à travers des liens  de voisinage et de parenté et leurs activités génératrices de revenu. Elles font le petit commerce d’habit, de friperie,  de poissons, et d’arachide. Dans le but de consolider leur petit commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 1er  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Fatoumata (2ème femme debout de la  gauche vers la droite sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse d’habits de toutes sortes et elle  s’approvisionnant chez son fournisseur à Bamako. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter une balle de friperie (habits). La revente se fait au comptant et à crédit dans la ville de Ségou sur place  et en ambulant à une clientèle composée d’hommes et  de femmes. Madame Fatoumata  compte réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 25 000 FCFA, qui sera investi dans l’activité et assurer l’entretien des enfants.
texts.en:
The group Lafia comprises seven women who are married for the most part and monogamous. The women average 34 years of age and three children each. They all live in Segou City (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali) and know one another through ties of community, kinship, and their revenue-generating businesses. They have small-scale businesses involving clothing, secondhand clothing, fish, and peanuts. 

With the goal of consolidating their small businesses, the group members decided to collaborate with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso and are now on their first solidarity loan cycle. 

Ms. Fatoumata (second women standing from the left in the photo) is a major vendor of clothing of all sorts. She gets her supplies from a supplier in Bamako. She intends to use her loan to purchase a bale of secondhand clothing. Sales are made in cash or on credit in Segou City, locally, and by going door to door. Her customer base is composed of men and women. 

Ms. Fatoumata plans on making an average monthly profit of 25,000 francs CFA that will be reinvested in her business and used to ensure her children's care.

loans.use: to purchase secondhand clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
