She requests this loan to buy ingredients like vegetables, meats, condiments and legumes, etc. to continue making her dishes.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meats, condiments, legumes, etc.

loans.name: Evelin Yamilet

texts.es: Evelyn vive con esposo y sus dos  hijos en casa propia, evelyn es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y muy emprendedora, desde hace varios años se dedica a la  producción y venta de productos lácteos en la zona donde reside y también a la siembra de maiz. Tiene muy buena clientela ya que ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus clientes. Ofrece calidad y buenos precios en sus productos,  ha decidido invertir en el cuidado de sus ganados ya que de eso depende su negocio. Por eso ha solicitado un crédito para poder comprar vitaminas y concentrado para el ganado y  asi poder seguirle dando a su familia una mejor calidad de vida sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: Evelyn lives with her husband and their two children in their own house. Evelyn is a responsible, hardworking and very resourceful woman, who has been engaging in producing and selling dairy products for many years in the area where she lives; she also plants corn. She has many good customers because she has succeeded in winning her customers’ confidence. She offers good quality products at fair prices, and she has decided to invest in caring for her cattle, as her activity depends on this. She has therefore requested a loan to buy vitamins and concentrated feed for her cattle in order to keep on offering her family a better standard of living with no restrictions.

loans.use: To buy vitamins and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Jon

texts.en:
Jon’s interest in electronics began as soon as he could explore the world as a toddler, as he was often seen carrying a wire around the house instead of toys. After high school, Jon left his family home in New York to pursue active duty in the Marine Corps, where he learned more about information management and technology. After leaving the Marines, Jon pursued a college degree and in 2004 moved to San Diego to begin working in the field of computer management.  

Frustrated with the lack of integrity and low commitment to helpful customer service commonly found in the industry, Jon looked for a way to provide better personal computer and information service to his clients. Through encouragement from a friend and colleague, Jon began to consider owning and managing his own business.  He was eventually offered an opportunity to take over a technology consulting firm, and he became the owner of All Connected Consulting.

Over 10 years later, Jon continues to offer the highest customer service and innovative solutions to the clients who entrust him with their data.  Jon finds value in earning the trust and respect of his clients, and takes pride in protecting his clients from fraud and computer mishaps.  

Currently, Jon hires three part-time sub-contractors, and hopes to soon expand his business to hire full-time employees from the community.  Jon shares his message to safeguard your data and files with everyone he can, and is committed to providing quality data consulting services.  

With the help of this Kiva loan, Jon will be able to purchase more technology equipment to help better serve and protect his clients from data loss, corruption and fraud.  

For more information on Jon’s business, visit http://www.allconnectedconsulting.com.

loans.use: to purchase more technology equipment to help protect his clients from data loss, corruption and fraud.

loans.name: Gloria Denia

texts.es: Gloria, tiene 45 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene dos hijos, y viven en el municipio de Azacualpa, Santa Bárbara. Ella tiene 3 años de dedicarse a la venta de ropa como camisas, blusas, pantalones, camisetas y otros. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en su comunidad. Esta solicitando un segundo préstamo el cual es por 7,000 lempiras y es para comprar ropa como blusas, camisas, pantalones y ropa de niño para vender y cubrir los pedidos de los clientes. su plan es comprar un vehículo para salir a otras aldeas y ampliar su mercado.
texts.en:
Gloria is 45 years old and she lives with her partner with whom she has two children. They live in the municipality of Azacualpa, Santa Bárabara. She has been selling clothing including shirts, blouses, pants, t shirts and other items for three years. Gloria makes her sales on foot within her community. 

She is requesting this second loan for 7,000 lempiras to buy clothing included blouses, shirts, pants and children's clothing to sell and be able to offer her customers the products they order. Her plan for the future is to buy a vehicle to go out to other communities and expand her market.

loans.use: to buy clothing including blouses, pants, skirts, shirts and children's clothing to resell.

loans.name: Julián

texts.es:
Julian es una persona muy trabajadora, anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta de carbón y también trabajaba en una metalúrgica, hoy, gracias a su esfuerzo dejo de trabajar en esa metalúrgica y se independizo. Esta trabajando en su propia herrería, a la cual ve con mucho futuro.
El quiere seguir trabajando y creciendo, es por eso que se esfuerza mucho. Esta vez solicita del crédito para poder invertirlo en un soldador para su herrería, una vez mas agradece por el crédito anterior, ya que le fue de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Julian’s a very hardworking person.   He used to work selling charcoal and also worked in a metal shop.  Today, thanks to his effort, he was able to stop working in that metal shop and become independent.  He’s working in his own metal shop now and he thinks it has a good future.

He wants to continue working and growing and this is why he exerts such an effort.  On this occasion he’s asking for the loan to buy solder for his metal shop.  Once again, he’s grateful for his previous loan which was of great use to him.

loans.use: to buy solder.

loans.name: Kuña Pojoaju Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Pojoaju está en su Sexto ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza el cual les permite conocer la situación de cada una, donde 2 de las 16 señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Elvira, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir con ingresos muy bajos. Ella se dedica a las ventas, ya que tiene una pequeña despensa por medio de la cual quiere y se esfuerza por ayudar a su familia. Cuenta que su negocio es su única fuente de ingresos y que con ello trata de dar a su familia lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de verduras, frutas, comestibles, productos a granel y demás para poder invertirlo en su negocio y seguir luchando por mejorar su economía.
texts.en:
The group called “Kuña Pojoaju” is in its sixth cycle in the women’s committee.  They all are committed to working hard to help each other out so they can all get ahead.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey which makes it possible for them to know the situation each one of them is in.  Two of the sixteen women are below the poverty line.

One of the members is Elvira whose survey indicated a level one poverty, that is to say, very low income.  She works in sales in that she has a small grocery store she works hard at to be able to support her family.  She relates that her business is her only source of income and she tries to provide everything her family needs by means of it.

She requests this loan to buy vegetables, fruit, foodstuffs, bulk items and others to invest in her business and continue striving towards an improved economy.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for the store.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La Sra. Maria es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos, que ya son personas adultas e independientes a ella. Tiene una farmacia bien surtida con medicamentos y artículos para regalos, trabaja en su negocio con uno de sus hijos ya que ella además de ese trabajo, es regente de algunos dispensarios de la zona.
Ella comenta que lucha por poder crecer y e ir mejorando su negocio cada día. También poder tener algún día una vejez digna y no tenga que pasar por privaciones.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de medicamentos y artículos para regalos, con lo cual podrá seguir trabajando y teniendo buenos productos que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maria is a single mother. She has 2 children who are adults and on their own. She has a well stocked pharmacy with medications and gift items. She works at her business with one of her children since besides that job she is the manger of some of the dispensaries in the area.

She says that she fights to be able to grow and improve in her business every day as well as to have a dignified old age and not lack for anything. She is asking for this loan to be able to keep working and having good products to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy medications to sell and also gift items.

loans.name: Van

texts.en:
Van is 63 years old and married with five children, two sons and three daughters. She lives with her family in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn income by running a general store in front of her house. 

She has had her business for ten years. She intends to take a loan to gradually expand her business by buying a variety of household items such as shampoo, detergent, sanitation products and food to sell to her customers. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a variety of food and household items to sell at her general store.

loans.name: Long

texts.en:
Long is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as food and beverages, to restock his general store. This purchase will help him to better meet the needs of his customers. His previous loan enabled him to improve his business and offer his customers a greater variety of products.
He hopes that his new loan will assist him in increasing the size of his store and improve his sales, helping him to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of foods, such as powdered milk, snack foods and confections.

loans.name: Muoi

texts.en:
A resident of Ho Chi Minh City, Muoi, 46 years old, is married and has two children, one son and one daughter. She and her husband support the family through the income they earn running a general store, a business they have been operating for 10 years.

Muoi is requesting a loan to increase her working capital and buy a range of new products such as food and beverages to stock her general store, purchases that will help her to better meet the needs of her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a range of new products such as food and beverages to stock her general store.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
Michael loves music but he loves creating it even more.

In January 2013 Michael started his business, Miek Wave Sound Lab in the Austin/San Marcos, Texas area.  Michael offers a wide range of services for his clients that includes music recording, audio engineering, piano lessons, music licensing, soundtrack services, pattern sequencing, and soundtrack production.  

Michael has educated himself on the latest technology and audio solutions for just about anyone in the music and entertainment industry.  Though he intends to hire an employee in the near future, he currently puts his considerable talents to work as a “one-man shop.”  He teaches music and piano, produces soundtracks and records voice-overs and music for clients.  

The loan Michael received allowed him to purchase a stage piano for live shows, system upgrades for his cinematic computer system, new microphones and a new mixer.  All these items were found by Michael at a discounted price because many of them were second-hand.  Michael understands the importance of stretching a dollar and doing research to find the best used items he can possibly find.  

Without help from Accion Texas Inc., Michael would have not been able to purchase the items for his business.  He plans to continue working with many artists in the Austin area and begin producing more, with the goal of one day licensing certain productions and earning full rights for each project he completes.

loans.use: to purchase a stage piano for live shows, system upgrades for his cinematic computer system, new microphones and a new mixer.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.en:
Gustavo has seen the serious consequences of drug addiction.  Many of his friends and members of his family suffered from this condition.   Witnessing the devastation of addiction affected Gustavo so deeply that he decided to volunteer at a halfway house for recovering addicts.

Through his volunteer work, Gustavo discovered that a drug testing facility didn’t exist in Kaufman County, Texas.  He realized there was an opportunity to meet a need in the marketplace and follow through with his commitment to help recovering addicts and keep them accountable.

Currently all drug testing for companies and organizations in and around Kaufman County are sent to Dallas for lab testing – a time consuming and costly process.  So Gustavo started Anonymous Professional Testing and was able to fill the missing gap.  After learning about Accion Texas Inc., Gustavo applied for a loan for help with startup. Gustavo used his loan from Accion to purchase office supplies, as well as equipment and supplies such as test tubes, syringes and lab coats.  He also used the funds to rent office space for his business.

Gustavo is the proud father of two sons and resides in Garland, Texas.  He will continue offering drug testing services for his community.  Gustavo said he feels a great sense of empathy for his clients because he understands what they are facing, but also understands that with hard work, there is light at the end of the tunnel.

loans.use: to purchase office supplies, as well as equipment and supplies such as test tubes, syringes and lab coats and to rent office space for his business.

loans.name: Medalla Milagrosa 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Medalla Milagrosa 2 se unió en busca de un bien común, está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas para poder salir adelante y crecer.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Laura, quien por medio de la venta de perfumes está tratando de salir adelante,  y ayudar a su familia. Ella es una persona muy emprendedora, que quiere trabajar y se esfuerza día a día por mejorar sus vidas.
Ella está con la esperanza de ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo, es por eso que solicita de este crédito, para poder invertirlo en la compra de perfumes de todas marcas de perfumes y demás. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella y sus amigas está recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group called “Medalla Milagrosa 2” (Miraculous Medal 2) came together for their mutual benefit.  It’s in cycle one in the women’s committee program.  They are all learning how to work as a group to get ahead and grow together.

One of the members is Laura who’s been trying to get ahead and to help her family by means of perfume sales.  She’s a very enterprising person who wants to work and strives daily to improve their lives.

She is hoping to help her family by means of her work which is why she’s asking for this loan to buy perfume of various brands and others.  She is grateful for the opportunity she and her girlfriends are receiving.

loans.use: to buy perfume to resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his mobile truck, buy cups, purchase spoons and ingredients, pay for a part-time employee and start developing a company website.

loans.name: Renacer Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Renacer está en su 13 ciclo, donde ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para conocer la situación de cada una de ellas. 5 de las miembros están con un ingreso muy por debajo, y están trabajando por mejorar.
Una de ellas es la Sra. Claudelina, quien se dedica a la venta de ropas, zapatillas y bijouterie. Es una persona muy trabajadora que hace de todo para poder crecer y dar a su familia lo que necesita. Su sueño es poder tener algún día una tienda para poder vender de todo y seguir luchando y mejorando su vida.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas y calzados, para poder invertirlo en su microemprendimiento, y de esa forma seguir mejorando sus ingresos y dar a su familia lo que necesita. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella y sus compañeras están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The group called “Renacer” (To Be Reborn) is in its 13th cycle.  They are taking the poverty elimination survey to get to know the situation each one of them is in.  Five members have income far below and are working to improve.

One of them is Claudelina who sells clothes, slippers and costume jewelry.  She’s a very hard-working woman who does everything possible to be able to grow and give her family what it needs.  Her dream is to someday have a store to be able to sell everything and to continue striving and improving her life.

She requests this loan to buy clothes and shoes to invest in her micro business and thus continue improving her income and give her family what it needs.  She’s grateful for the opportunity she and her fellow members are getting.

loans.use: to buy clothes and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Saima

texts.en:
Saima is a 36-year-old hardworking and diligent woman. She is living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, along with her husband and two daughters. Her husband has been running a tire shop for two years. 

Saima has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. Her husband would purchase new tires for selling purposes, and this would increase his net income and savings. Saima is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase new tires.

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
With 20 years of experience in mortgage management, Angelita offers mortgage services such as credit repair and consulting and processing mortgage loans through her home-based, start-up proprietorship, AB Mortgage Consulting in Humble, Texas.

Before opening AB Mortgage Consulting, Angelita was an employee at Wallis State Bank, where she was the top producer.  One of her co-workers from Wallis is now an Accion Texas Inc. loan officer.  She and the loan officer recently reunited through Brook Ballard Realty - a company Angelita partnered with to process mortgages.

She applied and was approved for a $5,450 loan from Accion.  She will use the funds to market her business.

loans.use: to market her business.

loans.name: Sang

texts.en:
Sang, 54, who is married and has two sons, lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband works for an insurance company, while she earns an income running a general store in front of her house.

Sang started this business 12 years ago and sells sugar, toys, soft drinks, yogurt and other household items to people in her community. She is requesting a loan to expand her business through the purchase of a greater variety of products, in particular foods and beverages, to stock in her store and thereby better satisfy her customers.

Sang hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food and beverages to stock in her store.

loans.name: Cadena De Mujeres Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Cadena de Mujeres está en su ciclo número 10 del programa de comité de mujeres, gracias al esfuerzo y al arduo trabajo de cada una de las miembros, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para poder conocer la situación de cada una de ellas, y mostro que todas están con ingresos muy bajos.
Una de las integrantes de este grupo es la Sra. De Las Nieves, quien gracias a su habilidad para hacer comestibles está saliendo adelante, ella se dedica a la elaboración de embutidos caseros. Ella misma se encarga de escoger sus insumos, y los elabora, tiene muy buena clientela y sus embutidos son muy solicitados y pedidos por los clientes. Ella cuenta que quiere seguir con sus proyectos e invertir en el.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para seguir haciendo sus embutidos, como ser carnes, especias, verduras y demás. Ella esta agradecida por esta oportunidad que le permitirá seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The group called “Cadena de Mujeres” (Chain of Women) is in cycle #10 in the women’s committee program thanks to the effort and hard work of each of the members.  They are completing the poverty elimination survey to get to know the situation each one of them is in.  It showed that all of them are of very low income.

One of the group members is De Las Nieves who thanks to her skill in making food is getting ahead.  She works making home-made cured meats.  She herself chooses the ingredients and makes them.  She has a good clientele and her cured meats are highly sought-after and ordered by her customers.  She relates that she wants to continue with her project and to invest in it.

She’s asking for this loan to buy ingredients like meats, spices, vegetables, and others to continue making the cured meats.  She’s grateful for the opportunity that will allow her to continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy meat, spices, vegetables and others.

loans.name: Victoriana Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Pilar  mujer de 43 años de edad, acompañada, desde hace 4 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos, sus productos los comercializas a vecinos cercanos a su domicilio, trabajadores de empresas públicas y privadas, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos de la Avon como perfumen de varón, perfumen de damas, pinturas de uñas, pinturas de labios, delineadores, lociones de varón, cremas faciales, cremas para manos, cremas para cuerpos, cremas para pies etc. Darling tiene 27 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon también y Aura tiene 34 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three hardworking members. One of them is Pilar who is a 43-year-old woman and has a partner. For four years she has had a business selling cosmetics. She sells her products to neighbors who live near her home as well as to private and public company employees. She will invest this loan in the purchase Avon cosmetics like men's and women's scents, nail polish, lipsticks, eye liners, men's lotions, as well as facial, hand, foot, and body creams. 

Darling is 27 years old and also has a business selling Avon cosmetics. Aura is 34 years old and she has a business selling new clothing.

video.title: Kiva Borrower Pilar del Rosario  from Nicaragua

loans.use: to purchase Avon cosmetics like men's and women's scents, nail polish, lipsticks, eye liners, men's lotions, as well as facial, hand, foot, and body creams.

loans.name: Kuña Pora Group

texts.es:
Kuña Pora gracias al trabajo de sus miembros esta en el sexto ciclo y tienen muchas ganas de poder llegar al máximo nivel del programa. Son mujeres jefas de familia que han visto una gran oportunidad de progreso en el grupo y es por eso que están luchando por salir adelante.
Claudia es una mujer muy trabajadora, que desde tempranas horas trabaja todos los días en su pequeña despensa. Ella cuenta que con mucho esfuerzo pudo ponerse su negocio, pero que con sacrificio y trabajo está creciendo. Su sueño es poder tener el día de mañana una gran despensa con todo lo que sus clientes necesitan y de esa forma procurar por su familia para darles todo lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su negocio, como ser verduras, frutas, carnes y demás, y con ello poder seguir dando a sus clientes lo que necesitan e ir mejorando su variedad de productos. Agradece por esta oportunidad que ella y sus amigas están recibiendo.
texts.en:
Kuña Pora, thanks to the work of its members, is in its sixth cycle. They are really eager to be able to get to the highest level in the program. These women are heads of household who have seen a great opportunity for progress in the group and that is why they are fighting to get ahead.

Claudia is a very hardworking woman. From the very early hours, she works every day in her little store. She says that with a lot of work she was able to open her business, but with hard work and sacrifice it is growing. Her dream is in the future to have a great store with everything her customers need and in that way get her family everything they need. 

She is asking for this loan to invest it in buying materials for her business, such as vegetables, fruit, meat and more. With it, she can keep giving her customers what they need and improving the variety of products. She is grateful for the opportunity that she and her friends are receiving.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruit, meat and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement, sand, blocs and iron.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
For decades, Joseph ran successful businesses – first a shoe shop, then trucking and transportation companies. But his world and his finances collapsed when all in the same year, he and his first wife divorced and then he suffered a heart attack. Splitting the assets from his business with his ex-wife, coupled with an avalanche of medical bills after the heart attack, caused Joseph to become homeless for a brief period of time. 

“I was living in this van and I could smell a hamburger that was grilling several blocks away,” Joseph said, describing this time in his life. “That’s how hungry I was.”  

Joseph picked up the pieces of his life by getting a job with a trucking company, and then going back to school to get his certification in accounting. Last year, he started a new life: he remarried and became a stepfather.  He also started a new business:  The Accounting Firm of Meizer & Meizer. 

Joseph does payroll and accounting services, specializing in transportation and warehousing companies. Joseph wanted to expand his services and to hire a part-time clerical worker so he could focus on sales. He applied for a small working capital loan with Accion Texas Inc. after a friend and client told him about the nonprofit organization.  Joseph is using his loan to buy a computer and software, to secure a lease for a small office space, and to hire a clerical worker. 

“Starting a small business is like having a child,” Joseph said. “I am at the toddler stage. A toddler is learning to walk, and gaining confidence, but he needs something to hold on to while he’s getting on his feet.  Well, this loan is something to hold onto. And now my legs can get stronger and then I can move on from here.”

As business picks up, and Joseph builds his capital, he plans to expand his business, hire more workers, and then eventually go back into the trucking and transportation industry again. He knows he can do it because he ran successful companies in the past. 

“I’ve been through the ringer, but I never lost faith,” Joseph said. “I really appreciate where I am in my life right now.”

loans.use: to buy a computer and software, to secure a lease for a small office space, and to hire a clerical worker.

loans.name: Virgen Del Carmen Group

texts.es:
Virgen del Carmen es un grupo de la ciudad de Paraguarí, está en el ciclo número 9 del programa de comité de mujeres, ellas están trabajando y luchan por poder salir adelante y dar a sus familias todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
Maria es una de las integrantes, quien cuenta que se dedica a la costura, ella hace todo tipo de servicios a sus clientes, y son ellos mismos quienes después hacen promoción de su buen trabajo. Cuenta que desde joven ha trabajado y así ayuda a su familia, su deseo es poder tener un taller de costura amplio y de esa forma también poder dar trabajo a otras personas.
Ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, gomas, botones y demás, ya que estos son los principales insumos que siempre usa para su costura. Esta agradecida por la oportunidad que recibe, ya que podrá seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
“Virgen del Carmen” is a group from the city of Paraguarí; it’s in cycle #9 in the women’s committee program.  They are working and striving to get ahead and to give their families everything they themselves were unable to have.

María is one of the members. She relates that she’s a seamstress.  She does all kinds of services for her customers and they themselves then recommend her good work.  She relates that she’s worked since she was young to help her family.  Her wish is to be able to establish a spacious sewing workshop in order to also provide employment for others.

She’s asking for this loan to buy fabric, thread, elastic, buttons, and others because these are the main supplies she always uses in her sewing.  She’s grateful for the opportunity she’s getting because she’ll be able to continue to grow.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Mujeres Progresistas Group

texts.es:
Mujeres progresistas es un grupo formado en la ciudad de Itá, el cual está integrado por 22 mujeres. Es un grupo muy numeroso que se esfuerza y quieren trabajar para ayudar a sus familias y de esa forma procurar por un mejor futuro.
Liz, una de las miembros, se dedica a la venta de comidas que ella misma hace. Cuenta que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas ya que se levanta para poder preparar sus comidas. Ella es muy sacrificada y comenta que todo lo que hace es para crecer y tener una vida mejor.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de carne, verduras, condimentos, especias y demás, para poder seguir deleitando a sus clientes con sus delicias.
texts.en:
“Mujeres Progresistas” (Progressive Women) is a group formed in the city of Itá; it has 22 women members.  It’s a very large group that strives and they want to work to help their families and attain a better future this way.

Liz, one of the members, works selling food she makes herself.  She relates that she works every day starting very early in the morning since she gets up to be able to prepare her meals.  She’s very self-sacrificing and she comments that everything she does she does in order to grow and have a better life.

She’s asking for this loan to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, spices and others to continue delighting her customers with her delicacies.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, spices, etc.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
Las 13 integrantes de este comité cuentan con actividades variadas, cada una de ellas trabaja arduamente por crecer y salir adelante, es por eso que se están esforzando al máximo. Quieren dar a sus hijos todo lo que ellas no pudieron tener.
La señora Maria, es la presidenta del comité, tiene una pequeña despensa en la que trabaja arduamente,  ella  solicita este crédito para invertirlo en la compra de azúcar, carnes, aceite, etc. para cargar más su despensa. Ella se define a si misma como una persona trabajadora que lucha por salir adelante y crecer.
texts.en:
The thirteen members of this committee have a variety of activities; each one of them works hard to grow and to get ahead.  This is why they are striving to the maximum; they want to give their children everything they themselves were unable to have.

María is committee president.  She has a small store she works hard in.  She’s asking for this loan to buy sugar, meats, oil, etc. to better stock her store.  She defines herself as a hardworking woman who strives to get ahead and to grow.

loans.use: to buy sugar, meats, oil, etc.

loans.name: Apolonia

texts.es:
Doña Apolonia es una mujer luchadora, feliz de 50 años de edad con un grado de escolaridad de primaria completo y madre de 2 hijos los cuales dependen de ella y le ayudan con las diferentes actividades en el campo como ser: Siembra, Limpieza, Fertilización, Abono, etc. Ella es Viuda ya que su esposo murió hace tres años desde entonces su única compañía son sus hijos con los cuales cuenta incondicionalmente. Ella es agricultora y fueron sus padres los que le enseñaron hace mucho tiempo dicha actividad en lo que es la siembra y cultivo de papa, frijoles y maíz. El terreno que ella cultiva es propio el cual pudo adquirir junto a su esposo en vida ubicado en la misma propiedad donde ella cultiva; por lo cual, esto a ella y a sus hijos les facilita dar el mantenimiento para que sus cultivos siempre estén sanos y libres de plagas.

Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de semilla de papa certificada, abono, fertilizantes y otros insumos para poder elaborar y cultivar un producto sano y seguro.      

Sus metas son poder cultivar una manzana de papa de calidad con la cual ella podrá obtener mayores ganancias y mejores ingresos para ella y para su familia ya que de esa manera ella podrá re-invertir en sus cultivos y poder cumplir con su compromiso y seguir gozando de estos beneficios.
texts.en:
Apolonia is a tenacious woman.  She is a happy 50-year old with an elementary school education.  She has two children who are dependent upon her.  They help her with the different field activities like planting, cleaning, fertilizing, and composting, etc.

She is a widow because her husband died three years ago.  Since then the only company she has had has been her children, whom she counts on unconditionally.  She is a farmer as were her parents.  A long time ago they taught her said business activity, which is planting and cultivating potatoes, beans, and corn. 

The land that she cultivates is her own, which she was able to get with her husband when he was alive.  The land that she cultivates is on her own property, which makes it easier for her and her children to provide maintenance so that their crops are always healthy and free of pests.

She is currently requesting help to buy certified potato seeds, manure, fertilizers, and other supplies in order to be able to work on and cultivate a healthy and safe product.  Her goal is to be able to cultivate a ‘manzana’ [1.740  acres] of quality potatoes with which she will be able to get greater profits and better income for herself and her family.  This way she will be able to reinvest in her crops, and she will be able to fulfill her obligation and continue enjoying these benefits.

loans.use: to buy certified potato seeds, manure, fertilizers, and other supplies.

loans.name: Fulgencio

texts.es:
El Sr. Fulgencio es de Ciudad del Este, está casado y tiene 2 hijos ya mayores. El es comerciante y tiene una despensa ubicada en su casa hace mas de 20 año.
Cuenta que ya tiene una muy buena clientela formada que siempre se acerca hasta su negocio para comprar de él. Esta con buenos productos frescos a todo momento y eso es lo que más agrada a su clientela. Comenta también que gracias a su trabajo es que pudo criar a sus hijos y darles lo que necesitan.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para su negocio, como ser leche, azúcar, fideos, arroz, carne, verduras frescas y demás, y por medio de esto seguir dando a sus clientes buenos productos a los que están acostumbrados.
texts.en:
Fulgencio comes from Ciudad del Este. He's married and has two children who are already adults. He's a merchant and has owned a grocery store located in his home for over 20 years.
He reports that he has already built a very good clientele who always comes to his place of business in order to buy from him. He has good, fresh products at any given time and this is what pleases his customers the most. He also reports that thanks to his work he was able to raise his children and provide for them.
He requests this loan in order to purchase supplies for his business, such as milk, sugar, noodles, rice, meat, fresh vegetables and other items. That way he'll keep on providing his customers with the good merchandise that they're accustomed to.

loans.use: to purchase milk, sugar, noodles, rice, meat, fresh vegetables and other items.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
Gabriela vive en casa de sus padres en la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz, trabaja como empleada en una farmacia donde percibe un sueldo mensual  con el cual se solventa sus necesidades y las de su hermana que está enferma.

El crédito que solicita es para paga los gastos médicos de su hermana quien será operada de la vesícula; por el carácter social y por la forma de pago califica para un nuevo crédito.

El sueño de Gabriela es poder independizarse de la casa de sus padres y poder comprar una casita.
texts.en:
Gabriela lives in her parents’ house in the Tembladerani area of the city of La Paz.  She works as an employee of a pharmacy where she gets a monthly salary.  She uses her salary to pay for her necessities and those of her sister, who is ill.

The loan that she is requesting is to pay her sister’s medical expenses.  Her sister will have a gall bladder operation.  Due to the social nature of the loan and the form of payment, she qualifies for a new loan.

Gabriela’s dream is to be able to become independent from her parents’ house and to be able to buy a little house.

loans.use: to cover the medical expenses of her sister's gall bladder surgery.

loans.name: Hien

texts.en:
Along with her husband, 53-year-old Hien has been running an internet shop and selling soft drinks in front of their house for five years, a business they started to cover their expenses and raise their two children. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Hien is requesting a loan to expand her business by repairing and upgrading her internet services and buying a variety of food and soft drinks to sell to her customers. She hopes that through the loan she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To upgrade and repair her internet services and buy food and soft drinks.

loans.name: Tien

texts.en:
Tien, 47, is married and has a son. He lives with his wife in Ho Chi Minh City. Tien has been running a general store in front of his house for five years. He is requesting a loan to expand his business by buying a greater variety of products including food, beverages and sanitation products to better satisfy his customers.

Tien hopes his business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist him in improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food, beverages and sanitation products to stock his store.

loans.name: Jiré Group

texts.es:
La señora Marta Julia es madre soltera, tiene 23 años de edad, de escolaridad 6to. primaria, tiene 1 hijo que aun no va a la escuela, ella se dedica a la preparacion y venta de refacciones, inició este negocio con poco capital y a la fecha lleva 2 años de experiencia en su negocio.

Decide organizar un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamos que le va servir para comprar insumos para la preparación de refacciones para vender, en el futuro desea tener un restaurante en el departamento; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio.
texts.en:
Marta Julia is a single mother.  She's 23 years old, has a sixth grade education, and has a son who attends school.  She makes and sells refreshments and began this business with a small amount of capital and has two years' experience.

She decided to join a group so that she could request loans which will help her buy ingredients with which to prepare refreshments to sell.  In the future she would like to have a restaurant in the department.  The rest of the group's members have businesses.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana and her big nice family lives in the village Tsovagyugh in the region of Gegharkunik. She has a husband who is in the Russian Federation working abroad, three daughters who are married and live with their families, and a son who still lives with Svetlana and works at the Police of Dilijan Department. 

Svetlana doesn’t have higher education, but she has a lot of work experience. She has worked as a cashier, then as a librarian at the village library, but last year she became unemployed. Today she is engaged in farming and agriculture. She has five cows, two calves and two bulls. All farming she organizes alone and she does it cleverly and accurately. 

This is Svetlana's fifth loan from Nor Horizon and the first one from Kiva. She needs 1.000.000 Armenian drams to buy more cattle. She is a hard-working woman and she will do her best to have a good income for her family and continue to deal with Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy more cattle

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Katupyry  y está en su ciclo número 7º  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza para conocer la situación de cada una, donde ninguna se encuentra por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir, están con un ingreso promedio, pero trabajan por ir mejorando cada día.
Adria es una excelente persona, sabe de su oficio, y es por eso que le va muy bien. Se dedica a la peluquería y gracias a ese trabajo es que está ayudando a su familia y tiene los ingresos necesarios para poder ayudarlos. Se esfuerza mucho desde que era joven, y su meta es poder agrandar su peluquería y también poder dar trabajo a otras personas que lo necesitan.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de spray, tintes, tijeras, shampoo, enjuagues y demás insumos para poder seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes. Agradece por esta oportunidad que están recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Kuña Katupyry group is in its 7th loan cycle of the women's communal bank programme, where everyone works and helps each other to get ahead. 

They are doing the elimination of poverty survey to understand each person's situation, where no one is below the poverty line, i.e. they are on an average income, but they work on getting better every day.

Adria is a great person, she knows her craft, and that's why she's doing very well. She works as a hairdresser and it's thanks to this work is that she is helping her family and she has the income needed to help them. She's worked very hard since she was young, and her goal is to enlarge her salon and also be able to give work to other people that need it.

She is applying for a loan to buy hairspray, dyes, scissors, shampoo, rinses and other supplies so she can continue providing a good service to her customers. She is thankful for this opportunity the group are getting.

loans.use: to buy hairspray, dyes, scissors, shampoo, rinses and other supplies.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
Ana, de 36 años de edad, esta casada con Jhon y tiene 3 hijos cuyas edades son 14, 11 y 2 años de edad respectivamente con quienes vive en su casa propia.El negocio de Ana consiste principalmente en brindar servicio de atención a pacientes con alguna dolencia o que requieren de atención médica inmediata o rutinaria. Es una mujer profesional que ha hecho de su carrera una forma de vida ya que considera que la vida y la salud de las personas son lo primordial para seguir adelante. Atiende básicamente a mujeres gestantes en su local que ha establecido para tal fin. Su área está destinada a madres gestantes, no obstante puede atender a cualquier persona que necesite ayuda brindándole la orientación necesaria hasta que logren ser atendidos por un médico especialista. Lleva en este negocio más de 2 años y con el tiempo ha ido mejorando su atención gracias a las herramientas y aparatos de laboratorio que ha conseguido poco a poco.Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite tener tiempo para dedicarse a su familia en el momento que sea necesario. Espera seguir trabajando como lo ha hecho hasta ahora para que asi logre implementar su local de atención con más instrumentos de laboratorio para empezar a realizar análisis diversos. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 2000 y está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero que le permita avanzar con su negocio.
Con el monto solicitado comprará artículos de salud como guantes quirúrgicos, alcohol, algodón, jeringas, y algunas pastillas para malestares leves.
texts.en:
36-year-old Ana is married to Jhon. She has three children aged 14, 11 and 2 years with whom she lives in a house that she owns. Ana's business consists mainly of caring for patients who have some illness or that require urgent or routine medical attention. She's a professional woman who has turned her career into a way of life, since she considers people's lives and health to be fundamental in order to get ahead. She basically tends to pregnant women in a place she has established for that purpose. Her services are destined to expectant mothers, however she can tend to anyone who needs help by providing them with the necessary guidance so that they can be treated by an expert physician. She has been in this line of work for over two years and she has been gradually improving her services thanks to the supplies and lab equipment she has acquired little by little. What she enjoys about her business is that it allows her to have time to care for her family whenever she needs to. She hopes to continue working as she has done so far so that she can supply her clinic with more lab instruments in order to begin running various types of analysis. On this opportunity she'll request 2000 nuevos soles. She's very glad to know that she'll get the financial support that allows her move forward with her business.
With the requested amount she'll purchase healthcare supplies such as surgical gloves, alcohol, cotton, syringes and some tablets for minor ailments.

loans.use: to purchase healthcare items such as surgical gloves, syringes, cotton, etc.

loans.name: Rio Ypane Belen Group

texts.es:
El grupo de RIO YPANE BELEN está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de  Concepción, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Francisca es una de las integrantes, ella es de una colonia pequeña en distrito de la ciudad Concepción, donde tiene su pequeño negocio de copetin, en el cual trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana. Ella desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de la ayuda de todas las personas de su zona puedan ir mejorando su entorno y así ofrecer una mayor seguridad a sus familias, también poder procurar para ellos un mejor futuro.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para su copetín, como ser bebidas, golosinas, panificados y demás. Y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The RIO YPANE BELEN group is in its second cycle in the Women’s Committee Program.  The group is from the city of Concepción, which is an area a little ways from the central zone, and it is still an area of growth.  It is a difficult area to access.  Therefore, the members of this group want to keep struggling to grow.  They want to give the area where they live a better atmosphere and to keep growing slowly.

Francisca is one of the members.  She is from a small neighborhood in the district where the city of Concepción is.  That is where she has her small business, a snack shop.  She works there every day starting in the very early hours of the morning.  She wishes that as time passes, and with help from all of the people from her area, they will be improving their environment.  This way they will give better security to their families and they will also be able to give them a better future.

She is requesting this loan to buy supplies for her snack shop.  She will buy things like drinks, candy, baked goods, and the rest.  This way she will be able to continue growing with her business.  This way she will give her family what they need to have a life without deprivations.

loans.use: to buy drinks, candy, baked goods, and the rest.

loans.name: Las Carinositas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Lucy tiene 34 años, casada con cuatro hijos de las edades de 16, 12, 10 y 8 años, todos se encuentra en edad escolar,  ella se dedica a la venta de ropa según la temporada,  en su puesto de venta que se encuentran en la zona de Cruce Taquiña, este préstamo es su  tercera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Lucy va a usar este préstamo para la compra de ropa por mayor como chompas y chamarras  para surtir su negocio ya que se acerca la época de invierno y estas prendas son de mucha demanda, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es falta de capital, La Sra. Lucy enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia diaria, va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando su puesto de venta, su deseo para su negocio tener mercadería surtida para ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes, la Sra. Lucy se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que le permite mejorar en su negocio ya que esta es su única actividad que le permite mantenerse y mantener a su familia.
texts.en:
Lucy, 34 , is married with four children aged 16, 12, 10  and 8. They are all of school age. 

She sells seasonal clothing in her stall located in the Cruce Taquiña area. 

This is her third loan from the institution. Lucy will use this loan to buy clothing such as sweaters and jackets at wholesale to stock up since the winter season is nearing and these are high demand items. 

Her reason for asking for a loan is lack of capital. Lucy has daily competition as a business challenge.  She will use the loan to improve her stall. 

Her wish for her business is to have enough merchandise in stock that she can offer a variety of products to her clients. 

Lucy is happy and grateful to the institution for the support given which allows her to improve her business, the only activity that allows her to take care of herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
El Sr. Felix tiene 50 años, está  casada con la Sra. Petrona ,ellos tienen 2 hijos en edad escolar ; el cliente  es electricista matriculado de  la Administración Nacional de Energía y trabaja en una empresa tercerizada que realiza trabajo para la Ande y también realiza trabajo  para domicilios particulares y su esposa cría y engorda animales  pequeños.
Gracias al trabajo que están  haciendo pueden mantenerse y ayudar a la educación de sus hijos. El Sr. Felix ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable y honesta con sus compromisos. Solicita este crédito para utilizarlo en la compra de herramientas en general para usarlas en su oficio de electricista. Agradece por la  oportunidad que está recibiendo, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Felix, 50, is married to Petrona and they have two school aged children. 

He is an electrician enrolled with the National Energy Administration and works for a company that outsources work in the Andes. He also does work on private homes and his wife raises and fattens small animals. 


Thanks to their work, they can maintain themselves and help with the education of their children. 

Felix has shown to be a very responsible and honest person with his commitments. 

He is asking for this loan to buy tools for his job as an electrician. 

He is appreciative of the opportunity given to him since it will help him a lot.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Sinforosa

texts.es:
La Sra. Sinforosa es de la ciudad de Luque, está casada y tiene 6 hijos. Ella tiene una  despensa, carbonería y además por la tarde se dedica a la elaboración y venta de bollos, dichos productos los vende con la ayuda de sus hijas por la zona de Luque.
Como se puede ver ella es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora, que hace de todo para poder mejorar sus condiciones económicas y dar a su familia lo que necesitan. Solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser frutas, verduras, carnes, productos a granel, Harina, arroz, fideos, yerba y demás, para poder seguir dando a sus clientes todo lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
Sinforosa is from the city of Luque. She is married and has 6 children. She has a grocery store, a coal yard and also in the afternoon she works making and selling buns. She sells these products in the area of Luque with the help of her daughters.
 
As you can see she is a very hardworking person and a fighter, who does everything in order to improve her financial situation and give her family what they need. 

She is applying for this loan to to buy supplies for her grocery store, such as fruit, vegetables, meats, bulk products, flour, rice, noodles, herbs and others, in order to continue providing her customers with everything they need.

loans.use: to buy fruit, vegetables, meat, bulk products, flour, rice, noodles, herbs and other things.

loans.name: Modesto

texts.es: Modesto, de 32 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de su esposa Celia con quien tiene 2 hijos; a los que cuida en la casa de su suegro desde hace 4 años.Lleva 10 años dedicándose de manera independiente a las tareas agrícolas, afirma que desde niño amó las tierras en las que hoy siembra sin reparo,además las extensas praderas de su pueblo le facilitan la siembra, por eso desea comprar más terrenos agrícolas y tener muchas hectáreas para trabajar. Sus principales sembríos constan de tubérculos, avena, quinua, cebada y otros productos mas. “él río que cruza el valle es frondoso es por ello que tengo buenos alimentos”, afirma. Esta ventaja hace que comercialice sus cultivos a la ciudad más cercana, donde le pagan un buen precio.Éste es el segundo crédito con Kiva y se siente muy agradecido por el apoyo financiero brindado ya que le permite seguir creciendo como persona, por ese motivo se compromete a ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.Modesto, invertirá los S/.3000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para nutrir sus sembríos.
texts.en: Modesto is 32 years old and is a responsible man.  He lives with his wife, Celia, and they have two children whom they care for in his father in law's home, and have for four years.  He has been farming on his own for the past 10 years and says that he has loved the land he farms on since he was a boy and he plants on it without rest.  The extensive grasslands of his village also make it easy to farm, so he wants to buy more farmland and have many hectares to work.  His main crops are tubers, oats, quinine, barley, and other things.  "The river that runs though the valley has many tributaries, so I have good foodstuff," he says.  This advantage allows him to sell his crops in the nearest town, where they pay a good price.  This will be his second Kiva loan and he feels grateful for the financial support because it allows him to continue growing as a person.  He is committed to being on time with his payments.  Modesto will invest the 3,000 PEN from this loan in compost to feed his crops.

loans.use: to buy compost.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto, es casado y tiene dos hijos que están en etapa escolar; ahora viven en casa de sus suegros ocupando tres habitaciones con paredes de ladrillo, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona plan autopista de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja por mas de doce horas como chófer y a veces hasta muy altas horas de la noche ya que con lo poco que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento general de su vehículo ya que es su única fuente de ingresos que tiene.
El sueño de Roberto es tener su casa propia para brindar más comodidad y seguridad a su familia.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Roberto is married and has two school aged children. 

Currently he lives in his in-laws' house occupying three small rooms with brick walls. The house is located in the city of La Paz's Plan Autopista zone. 

He works as a driver for more than twelve hours daily and sometimes into very late at night.  

With the little he earns her has to cover basic food, education and utilities for his family. 

He is requesting a loan for general maintenance for his vehicle sine it is his only source of income. 

Roberto's dream is to own his own house to give his family more comfort and security. 

This is the second time he is asking IMPRO and KIVA for credit.

loans.use: to pay for general maintenance for his taxi.

loans.name: Sitora

texts.ru: Ситора добрая женщина, но она имеет очень трудную судьбу, так как она разошлась с мужем и воспитывает 2 детей сама. С расходами семьи она справляется сама, так как ее бывший муж не помогает обеспечить детей. Она живет в родительском доме. Более 5 лет она занимается купле продажей продуктов питания в магазине, который находится близко заводу по производстве масла. Она с бизнесом справляется сама и имеет своих постоянных клиентов. Ситора мечтает купить себе и своим детям все не обходимые средства для счастливой жизни. Она должна купить продукты питания для расширения ассортимента товара, но не имеет денег. Если она не будет расширить ассортимент своего товара, то потеряет своих клиентов, так как другие бизнесмены периодически расширяют ассортимент товара. Она является основной кормилицей семьи и поэтому очень волнуется, что может терять клиентов и останется без денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7000 сомон для покупки продуктов питания, как разнообразные печенья, конфеты, чай, макарон, масло, соль и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Sitora is a good woman, but she has a very difficult life, as she separated from her husband and is raising two children on her own. She handles the expenses of the family herself, since her ex-husband does not help to support the children. She lives in the family home (of her parents). 

For over five years, she has been buying and selling food products in a store, which is located near an oil production factory. She copes with the business herself and has regular customers. Sitora dreams of buying herself and her children all the necessities for a happy life. She has to buy food to expand the assortment of products, but she has no money. If she does not expand her product assortment, she will lose her customers, as other business owners periodically expand their range of goods. 

She is the main breadwinner in the family and therefore worries that she may lose her customers and be left without money. She is asking for a loan of 7,000 somoni to buy food products such as assorted pastries, candy, tea, pasta, oil, salt, etc.

loans.use: to buy food items such as biscuits, candy, tea, pasta, butter, etc. for her food market

loans.name: Ngoc

texts.en:
Ngoc is 49 years old and is married with three children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She has run a general store at her house for 16 years.

She sells milk, beverages, stationery, confectionery and some household electrical goods. She intends to use her loan to buy many kinds of products to sell such as eggs, sugar and sanitation items.

She hope her business runs smoothly and will help her to improve her family's living conditions and save money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy eggs, sugar and sanitation items.

loans.name: Loan

texts.en: Loan, 31, is single and lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Loan started a store of selling charcoal 12 years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of coal to sell at her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy a greater variety of coal to sell at her store.

loans.name: Xoe

texts.en:
Xoe is 54 years old and is widowed with two children, a son and a daughter. Xoe has been running a grocery store for seven years. She started this business to cover her expenses and to generate income to raise her children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. 

Xoe is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying better quality vegetables to sell from her stall. She hopes that this will enable her to attract more customers and that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. She hopes that through the loan, she will be able to expand her business activities, and have money to reinvest to her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy vegetables to sell from her store.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 49-year-old married woman and the mother of five children. She has been working in a tailoring business since 25 years ago to help her husband with their income and covering their children's expenses.

Fatima is a hardworking woman with a very good reputation in her region because of her long experience in her domain. She is applying for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to buy necessary fabrics requested for a project she is working on. 

This is Fatima's first loan cycle as an Al Majmoua borrower; she hopes that the future loans will be also invested in developing her business more and more.

Her business is located at home to make sure that she is taking care of both her family and business development at the same time.

loans.use: to buy requested fabrics for a project she is working on.

loans.name: Huong

texts.en: Huong would like to take a further loan to buy more food for selling and a scooter for transportation. Her previous loan enabled her to increase her sales and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food for selling and a scooter for transportation.

loans.name: Zaynab

texts.ru: У нее трудное условия жизни и низкий доход, но доброе сердце и хороший нрав. Она -Зайнаб из Таджикистана. Ей 50 лет, замужем и на воспитании имеет 1 сына, которому 19 лет и зовут его Равшан. Более 7 лет она занимается выращиванием сельхоз культуры, как картофель, лук, морковь и т.п. Полученный доход она продает на рынке. Так как у нее высококачественный урожай, так и ее товары имеют большой спрос. Ее муж помогает ей в ведении бизнеса. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами она хочет развевать свой бизнес, а для этого она должна получить больше урожая. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000  сомони, чтобы купить минеральные удобрения. Доход, который она будет получать от бизнеса, будет использовать для образования своего сына и улучшения условия жизни. Она нуждается и ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
She is Zaynab from Tajikistan. She has had a difficult living conditions and low income, but has a kind heart and good temper. She is 50 years old, married, and has a 19-year-old son whose name is Ravshan. 

For more than seven years, she has been growing crops like potatoes, onions, carrots, and the like. For an income, she sells the crop at the market, since she has high yield and her products are in high demand. Her husband helps her in running the business. 

In order to provide the family with all the necessities, she wants to develop her business, and for that she needs to get a more yield. She is asking for a loan of 3,000 somoni, in order to buy mineral fertilizer. 

The income that she will receive from the business will be used for the education of her son and to improve living conditions.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers for land where she grows vegetables

loans.name: Hong

texts.en: Hong is requesting a new loan to repair her husband's scooter and buy more food to sell. Hong's previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her to increase the size of her business, attract new customers and increase her sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To repair her husband's scooter and buy more food to sell from her stall.

loans.name: Fe Y Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo denominado Fe y Esperanza está en el primer ciclo ellas están aprendiendo a trabajar juntas, quieren crecer para poder ayudar a sus familias por medio de su trabajo, ya que no quieren que pasen por necesidades como las que ellas pasaron.
La Sra. Isabel es la presidenta del grupo, ella es peluquera y manicurista, es madre de 2 chicas, ya independientes, vive con su marido en casa propia, asiste a las reuniones de su comité, trabaja solidariamente con sus compañeras y las motiva constantemente para que todas trabajen con esfuerzo y entusiasmo.
La Sra. Solicita  este crédito para la compra de insumos de peluquería como ser tintes, shampoo, enjuagues, cremas y demás para aumentar su variedad, lo que le ayudará  a concretar su plan de negocio, y aumentar su ingreso y sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group called "Fe y Esperanza" (Faith and Hope) is in its first loan cycle. The members are learning to work together. They want to grow to be able to help their families through their work, since they don't want them to experience the needs that they experienced.

Señora Isabel is the president of the group. She is a beautician and manicurist. She is the mother of two daughters who are already independent. She lives with her husband in their own house. She attends the meetings of her group and works in solidarity with her fellow group members and constantly motivates them so that everyone works with effort and enthusiasm.

Señora Isabel's loan is for the purchase of beauty supplies such as dyes, shampoo, rinses, creams, and other items to increase her variety, which will help her to work out her business plan and increase her income and her customer base.

loans.use: to buy dyes, shampoo, rinses, creams, and other items.

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith sells grains and also produces palm oil in Wegbe, Hohoe. Edith has received an education to the middle school level. She is a widow and has three children. Edith has been selling grains and producing palm oil for the past 11years. 

To prepare her palm oil, she washes the palm fruit and boils them until they become soft and tender. She scoops the cooked fruit into a big mortar and gently pounds with a pestle to avoid damaging the nut. Water is then added to the pounded fruit. The mixture of water and the pounded fruit is squeezed and filtered to get the juice out and the chaff removed. The chaff is sometimes used by the local people to light charcoal fires. The juice is boiled again and as it boils, the fresh oil will float to the surface of the pot. The oil is scooped into yet another pot and left to cool. 

Fresh oil from palm fruits is traditionally used in eating roasted yam or plantains in Africa – especially on the farms after a hard day's work. Palm oil is the preferred type of cooking oil because Ghanaians like its consistency and flavor. It is used in most traditional dishes.

She is responsible for all the general upkeep of herself and children. Her loan will be used to buy bags of beans, maize and palm-nut fruits. She hopes to save and use the new profits from her business to boost her working capital.

loans.use: to buy bags of beans, maize and palm-nut fruits

loans.name: Nigora

texts.ru: Нигора молодая, шустрая и талантливая женщина. Ей 23 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Дети Мубина и Абдулло и им 4 и 2 года. Ее муж Мухаммадджон занимается предоставлением услугой такси. Нигора является мастером своего дела. Она опытная портниха и создает шедевры таджикских национальных платьев. С целью обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами  5 лет назад она начала свой бизнес. Она шьет женские платья и школьные формы у себя дома. Благодаря  хорошему сервису, она обладает широким кругом клиентов. Ее родственница Мукаддас помогает ей введение бизнеса.  Она нуждается новой швейной машинки и тканей, но ее доход не позволяет ей купить это. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки новой швейной машинки и тканей. Она надеется на вас и вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nigora is a young, smart and talented woman. She is 23 years old. She is married and has two children. The children Mubina and Abdullo are four and two year old, respectively. Her husband Muhammadjon provides taxi services. Nigora is a master of her trade. She is an experienced dressmaker and creates masterpieces of Tajik national dress. 

In order to support the family with all the necessities, she started her own business five years ago. She sews women's dresses and school uniforms at her home. Through good service, she has a wide circle of customers. Her relative Mukaddas helps her to run the business. 

She needs a new sewing machine and fabrics, but her income does not allow her to buy them. She is asking for a loan of US$3,000 to buy a new sewing machine and fabrics.

loans.use: To buy a sewing machine and fabrics for developing her business

loans.name: Van

texts.en: Van is requesting a new loan to buy noodles and meat to make food to sell and pay school fees for her children. Van's previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her to increase the size of her business, attract new customers and increase her sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy noodles and meat and pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Cay

texts.en: Cay is requesting a new loan to buy food to sell and pay school fees for her children. Cay's previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing her sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy food to sell and pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлана замужем. У нее двое детей. Она имеет свой бизнес. Светлана занимается продажей женской одежды, головных уборов и шарфов. Благодарая предыдущему кредиту Светлана смогла закупить больше товара и получить дополнителную прибыль.

В этот раз Светлана просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 10000 гривен на ремонт квартиры. На эти деньги она хочет положить кафель на пол в кухне, поклеить обои, сделать  гипсокартонный потолок и отремонтировать пол. Также она хотела бы заменить входную дверь. Кредит поможет улучшить жилищные условия ее семьи.
texts.en:
Svetlana is married. She has two children. She has her own business. Svetlana sells women's clothing, head wear, and scarves. Thanks to a previous loan, Svetlana was able to buy more goods and to get additional profit.

This time, Svetlana is requesting a loan of 10,000 hryvnia to repair her apartment. WIth this money, she wants to put tiles on the kitchen floor, to put up wallpaper, to make a plasterboard ceiling, and to repair the floor. Similarly, she would like to replace the front door. The loan will help improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to do repairs in her apartment and to improve the living conditions of her family

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a water dispenser and other WASH (sanitation) products

loans.name: Tursunmurod

texts.ru: Турсунмуроду 28 лет. Он женат и у него меленький ребёнок. Турсунмурод вместе с семьей проживает в районе Яван. Он живет с родителями. У них большая и дружная семья. В его семье все работают в дехканском хозяйстве (это индивидуальное или коллективное частное хозяйство, где выращивают сельхоз культуру). Турсунмурод с детства помогал родителям в хозяйстве. Вот уже 3 года как он занимается земледелием самостоятельно. Турсунмурод запрашивает кредит для закупа минерального удобрения для урожая пшеницы и ячменя. Он хочет собрать богатый урожай и за счет продажи улучшить бытовые условия в семье.
texts.en:
Tursunmurod is 28 years old. He is married with one small child. Tursunmurod resides with his family in the Yavan region. He lives with his parents. They have a big and friendly family. In his family, everyone works in a dekhan farm (an individual or collective private farm where agricultural crops are grown). 

Since childhood, Tursunmurod has helped his parents on the farm. For the past three years, he has engaged in farming on his own. Tursunmurod is requesting a loan for the purchase of mineral fertilizer for wheat and barley. He wants to gather a rich harvest and through selling it to improve the living conditions of the family.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer for wheat and barley

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo de Kuña guapa está en su ciclo número 2 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de  Curuguaty, la cual es una zona un poco alejada de la zona céntrica y aun se encuentra en crecimiento. Es una zona de difícil acceso, por lo que las integrantes de este grupo quieren luchar por ir creciendo y dar a la zona donde viven un mejor ambiente y que vayan creciendo lentamente.
La Sra. Laura, una de las miembros, se dedica a la venta ambulante de todo tipo de productos, como ser prendas y calzados y por medio de este trabajo lucha por dar a su familia lo que necesitan. Ella desea que conforme pase el tiempo, y por medio de la ayuda de todas las personas de su zona puedan ir mejorando su entorno y así ofrecer una mayor seguridad a sus familias, también poder procurar para ellos un mejor futuro.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de insumos para poder venderlos, como ser prendas, calzados, y artículos de mercería en general. Y de esa forma poder seguir creciendo con su negocio y dar así a su familia lo que necesitan para tener una vida sin privaciones.
texts.en:
The group "Kuña guapa" is in its second loan cycle in the women's committee program. It is from the city of Curuguaty, which is in a zone a bit removed from the central zone and yet is growing. It is a zone where access is difficult, and for this reason the members of this group want to strive to grow and give the zone where they live a better environment and have it grow slowly.

Señora Laura, one of the members, works as a street vendor of all types of products, such as clothing and shoes, and through this work she strives to give her family what they need. She desires that with the passing of time and through the help of everyone in her zone, they can continue to improve their surroundings and thus offer better security to their families and also be able to obtain a better future for them.

She is applying for this loan to buy items to sell, such as clothing, shoes, and dry goods articles in general, and in this way be able to continue growing in her business and thus give her family what they need to have a life without privations.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, and other dry goods items

loans.name: Hang

texts.en:
Hang is 35 years old and widowed. She has been running a shop selling sugar cane juice in front of her door for two years. She started this business to cover her expenses and raise her daughter. They live in Ho Chi Minh City.

Hang is requesting a loan to expand her business by buy a new juicer and furniture so that she will be able to increase the turnover of her business. 

She hopes that through the loan, she will be able to expand her business activities and have money to reinvest in her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy furniture and a new juicer to equip her shop.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma, 57 years old, is a married woman and has been blessed with 10 children, five of whom still attend school. Together with her husband, they live in their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She has operated a fish-selling business for over six years, selling from home to restaurant operators and passersby. She faces a major challenge of lack of food preservation leading to losses.

With the KSHS 10,000, she wants to purchase fish for resale. She dreams of expanding her business and establishing another business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fish for resale

loans.name: Kaibeh

texts.en: Kaibeh is 37 years old and lives in Paynesville, which is one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is married and has two children. They live at home and are in school. Unfortunately, Kaibeh's parents did not send her to school, but she is good at managing her business. Her husband is a security guard. For the past three years, she has been selling soft drinks and water by the sack in the local market and now she faces no problems. She spends six days a week from 7 AM to 5 PM on her business. She started this business with a little income she received from her husband. She is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks and water by the sack for her business. She hopes to build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks and water to sell

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор уже 25 цикл кредитуется в ИМОН и очень хорошо справляется с погашением кредита, так как она успешная бизнес леди и умеет вести своё дело. Гулбахор имеет хорошую кредитную историю. Ей 51 года. Она замужем и имеет 2 детей. Более 18 лет она занимается купле продажей фруктов и овощей на местном рынке. Она покупает оптом и продает в розницу. Ее муж помогает ей введение бизнеса. Полученный доход она использует для обеспечения семьи и улучшения условия домохозяйства. Она хочет расширить свой оборотный капитал и  поэтому она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки фруктов и овощей. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Gulbahor is borrowing for her 25th cycle with IMON and has been very good at repaying the loans, as she is a successful businesswoman and knows how to conduct her business. Gulbahor has a good credit history. She is 51 years old. She is married and has two children. 

For more than 18 years, she has been buying and selling fruits and vegetables in the local market. She buys wholesale and sells retail. Her husband helps her run the business. She uses the income to support the family and to improve the conditions of the household. She wants to expand her working capital, and therefore is requesting a loan of 1,500 somoni to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Yen

texts.en: Yen is requesting a new loan to repair her sales showcase and buy bread and pork to sell. Yen's previous loan enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income to support her family. She hopes that another loan will assist her in increasing the size of her business, attracting new customers and increasing her sales. She also hopes that through the loan, she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To repair her sales showcase and buy bread and pork to sell

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина умная и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 21 года. Она не замужем и живет с родителями.
